Ash, Brock, Misty and Meowth all had a battle to see who would keep Togepi but even though Ash won, Togepi would only want to be with Misty as she was the first person it saw. Misty`s Togepi evolve into Togetic in the Mirage Kingdom and soon left Misty to look after soon Togepi.

character.name: Eleboo (Moe)
character.description: Macey`s Electabuzz battled against Ash during the preliminary round of the Johto Silver Conference.

character.name: Crab (Satoshi)
character.description: Krabby was caught by Ash near Bill`s Lighthouse during the sunset. Ash did not use a Pokémon to capture Krabby, instead he just threw a Pokéball after throwing a stick at it. Being Ash`s 7th Pokémon, Krabby was transferred to Prof. Oak`s laboratory where it stayed and enjoyed some of Prof. Oak`s poetry. Kanto Pokémon League. Ash`s first battle in the Indigo Plateau was on the water field and Ash decided to call upon Krabby to help him out despite not having any battle experience so far. Krabby was Ash`s first choice Pokémon against his opponent, Mandi, who was using an Exeggutor. After becomming trapped in the pool due to Exeggutor`s Psychic attacks and looked to be in trouble as Exeggutor then started to bombard the pool with an Egg-Bomb attack. A concerned Ash attempted to recall Krabby but the whirlpool prevented him to do so. Krabby however, managed to turn the battle after regaining its composure and managed to clamp onto exeggutor with a vicegrip attack. With the battle advantage in Krabby`s favour, he managed to beat Exeggutor after a Leer and Stomp attack. After the battle Krabby evolved into Kingler which was caught live on camera and seen by the audience.

character.name: Dodo (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Gary`s Doduo which resides at Prof. Oak`s Laboratory when Gary is not using it.

character.name: Rokon (Yuki)
character.description: Given to Brock by Suzy when he visited Scissor Street. Given back to Suzy.

character.name: Kentauros (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash caught 30 Tauros while at the Kanto Safari Zone Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Rocky Field) Ash chooses Tauros as his third Pokémon to go against Drake`s Gengar. Ash tells Tauros to begin with Fissure but Gengar jumps into the air and avoids the attack. Whilst in the air Gengar uses Confuse Ray which makes Tauros attack the nearby rock and damage itself in the process. Ash quickly recalls Tauros and sends out Lapras in the water pool in the middle of the stage. Lapras and Gengar battled each other and ended up eliminating each other when their attacks collided. With Drake losing his third Pokémon there was a short interval whilst the battle field change into a sandy field. Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Sand Field) The interval ended and Drake began by choosing Venusaur whilst Ash brought Tauros back into the battle who had now recovered from Gengar`s Confuse Ray. Ash`s first move was to have Tauros stamp its feet to use Fissure, however, the soft sand absorbed the move. Drake took advantage of the situation by having Venusaur use Solarbeam but knowing Solarbeam takes a while to charge up, Ash have Tauros charge straight towards Drake`s Venusaur and flip it into the air just before it fired. Venusaur managed to adjust itself mid-air and fire the Solarbeam at Tauros. The impact was close to Tauros and knocked it down but it managed to recover and get back to its feet quickly. Venusaur struck Tauros with one of its Vine Whip attacks but Tauros manage to avoid any further strikes and successfully land a Take Down move on Venusaur and eliminate it from the battle. Drake sent out Electabuzz and Ash decided to give Tauros another rest and switched in Bulbasaur. Tauros was switched in again after Ash recalled the eliminated Squirtle. Tauros charged into the middle of the field whilst Dragonite flew up and use Body Slam. To Drake`s surprise Ash told Tauros to stand its ground and endure the hit, which it does so successfully and even manages to throw Dragonite to the floor using its horns. Dragonite get up and uses Thunderbolt which proves too much for Tauros and eliminates it from the battle leaving Ash with one Pokémon left. After Ash had won the battle against Drake he called out all of his Pokémon that participated in the battle on the stage as Drake presented him with the Winner`s Trophy. Then Ash, Pikachu, Tauros, Lapras, Squirtle, Bulbasaur and Charizard all had their handprints set in stone to be remembered in the Orange Island Hall of Fame.

character.name: Betbeton (Satoshi)
character.description: Caught by Ash. Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Round 4 - Vs Ash Ketchum - Grass Field Despite looking like a weak opponent Jeanette`s Bellsprout managed to KO both Ash`s Bulbasaur and his Pikachu. Ash turned to Muk who he transferred from Prof. Oak just before the battle. Due to Muk`s slow speed and bigger size it could not avoid Bellsprouts attack but thanks to its slimy and elastic body it was simply able to absorb them and not feel any damage. Bellsprout continued to launch a number of ounches, kicks and throws but still Muk absorbed them all. After repelling a Razor Leaf attack Muk smothered Bellsprout with its body and after a few seconds of struggling Bellsprout was defeated, giving Ash the victory and earned him a place in the final 16. Please with its victory it gave Ash a hug which forced Ash to the ground. Ash laughed and praised Muk for giving him the victory.

character.name: Nishinomori-kyouju (5sei)
character.description: Professor Westwood works in a laboratory on the Seaform Islands. He cares for his Slowpoke, although he shown great interest in its evolution when Jessie`s Shellder clamped onto the end of it.

character.name: Junsaa
character.description: She is part of a family of policewomen found in almost every town. All of her sisters are named the same, and look identical. They are responsible for enforcing the law, and are often called on when Team Rocket is causing trouble. They typically use Growlithe as an attacking Pokemon. They are also part of Brock`s innumerable fantasies about girls, and he seems to be the only one able to tell the various officers apart. The Officer Jennys that are apart of the Orange Islands Police Force have lighter uniforms than those of the Kanto Region.

character.name: Joy
character.description: She is part of a large family of nurses, found in almost every town. Her sisters are named the same and look identical. They are responsible for healing sick and injured Pokemon, as well as the registration for various tournaments and contests. They use Chanseys as their assistants. They are also part of Brock`s innumerable fantasies about girls, and he seems to be the only one able to tell the various nurses apart.

character.name: Tosakinto (Kasumi)
character.description: Goldeen was first seen distracting Team Rocket while Ash rescued the Pokémon in the Pokémon Center.

character.name: Lucky (Joy)
character.description: Nurse Joy`s Chansey works at the Pokemon Center to help with injured Pokemon.

character.name: Vincent
character.description: Victor is a surfer who attempted to emulate his hero Jan by planting his flag at the peak of a rock whilst riding a huge wave called the "Humunga-Dunga". After failing once he rescued a Pikachu which had washed up on the shore. The Pikachu, named Puka, had the an ability where it could sense big waves. Many years later another "Humunga-Dunga" wave appeared and Victor successfully rode the surfboard along with Puka to put his flag alongside Jan`s. Pleased with his success, Victor told some young surfers that they could do it too.

character.name: Caterpie (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Caterpie was the first wild Pokémon Ash caught.

character.name: Transel (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Metapod evolved into a Butterfree while trying to protect Ash from a Beedrill.

character.name: Jan
character.description: Jan is a surfer from many years ago. During that time he managed to place a flag on the peak of a tall rock by riding the "Humunga-Dunga" Wave. Jan would offer encouragement to Victor while he was practicing to become a surfer himself. After completing him feat of placing the flag on the rock, he gave his surfboard to Victor and told him that he could do it too.

character.name: Samurai
character.description: While traveling through Viridian Forest, Ash was approached by Samurai, who was looking for the next trainer from Pallet Town. Samurai challenged Ash to a Pokémon battle, causing Ash to forget about the wild Weedle he was trying to capture, which then escaped. The battle started off with Samurai`s Pinsir going up against Ash`s Pidgeotto, who was already tired from the battle it just had with the wild Weedle. Samurai`s Pinsir quickly defeated Ash`s Pidgeotto, forcing Ash to call on Ash`s Metapod. Ash`s Metapod`s Harden raised its defense enough so that Samurai`s Pinsir`s horns had no effect on it. Samurai then recalled Samurai`s Pinsir and sent out Samurai`s Metapod. The two Pokémon were locked in a stalemate using the same Harden attack over and over again. However, the battle was forced into a draw when a swarm of wild Beedrill approached and flew off with Ash`s Metapod. In hot pursuit by the Beedrill, the group ran off and headed for Samurai`s cabin. Once there, Samurai revealed that he had previously battled and lost to Gary Oak and the other two trainers from Pallet Town. Samurai told Ash that he was a joke of a trainer compared to the previous trainers that had come from Pallet. He then called Ash a bad trainer for leaving Ash`s Metapod outside with the Beedrill. The next day, Ash was able to retrieve Ash`s Metapod, which evolved into Ash`s Butterfree. Ash was then able to earn the respect of Samurai after he defeated the swarm of Beedrill with his new Pokémon.

character.name: Transel (Samurai)
character.description: Caught by Samurai

character.name: Butterfree (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Metapod evolved into a Butterfree while trying to protect Ash from a Beedrill.

character.name: Iwark (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock received it as an Onix as a birthday present from his father, Flint.

character.name: Ishitsubute (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Geodude was first seen at the Pewter Gym where it is currently staying.

character.name: Rikao
character.description: Seymour is a scientist that investigated why Pokémon were behaving strangely on Mt. Moon. After discovering Team Rocket was behind it, they were sent blasting off. There, Seymour and the others befriended a Clefairy.Seymour had a theory that they came from space via shuttle. When the gang witnessed some Clefairy evolve into Clefable, Seymour decided to live on Mt. Moon to do further research.

character.name: Zubat (Takeshi)
character.description: It is unknown when Brock captured Zubat but he sent it out to battle against Team Rocket.

character.name: Hitodeman (Kasumi)
character.description: Misty`s Staryu is one of the powerhouses on her water Pokémon based team and has seen action in numerous battles. This is one of her three original team members which also had Misty`s Goldeen and Misty`s Starmie, its final evolved form. The attacks it was commonly seen using were Water Gun and occasionally Rapid Spin. Misty`s Staryu`s personality is largely a mystery due to the fact that it has no face and thus no facial expressions but has proven its self to be very dependable time and time again.

character.name: Botan
character.description: Lily is one of Misty`s older sisters. She is also one of the three temporary gym leaders at the Cerulean Gym along with her other two sisters, Violet and Daisy.

character.name: Sakura
character.description: Daisy is the oldest of Misty`s sisters. She is also one of the three temporary gym leaders at the Cerulean Gym along with her two other sisters. Daisy took most of responsibility for the gym while Misty was away traveling. Daisy more sensitive toward Misty as opposed to Lily and Violet who often tease her more.

character.name: Ayame
character.description: Violet is one of Misty`s older sisters. She is also one of the three temporary gym leaders at the Cerulean Gym along with her two sisters: Daisy and Lily.

character.name: Starmie (Kasumi)
character.description: Starmie was first seen in Misty`s Gym battle against Ash.

character.name: Akira
character.description: A.J. runs an unofficial Pokémon gym. He owns many Pokémon, but favors his Sandshrew. He won 98 consecutive wins and was undefeated. Ash challenged him to a battle, but was defeated, ultimately making him A.J.`s 99th victory. After discovering A.J.`s vigorous training routine, Ash criticized A.J.`s methods. Brock and Misty, however, were impressed with the strength of his Pokémon. When A.J.`s Sandshrew was stolen by Team Rocket, A.J. and the others went looking for it. After finding Team Rocket, he challenged them to a battle where he earned his 100th win. With this victory, A.J. felt ready to finally start travelling in attempts to becoming a Pokémon master.

character.name: Jun
character.description: Joe was a student at the illustrious prep school, Pokémon Semi. He was constantly teased by the other students at the school. He first met Ash and his friends one day while being teased by those students. Ash wanted to battle them so they`de stop picking on him but they didn`t want to battle him because they thought they would harm the reputation of the Pokémon Semi and they decided to leave. Joe showed Ash and his friends around the school including a Pokémon battle simulator. Misty battled Joe to show him that not all battles could be simulated. She easily defeated him. Joe has a crush on Giselle, who is one of the top students in the elementary class at Pokémon Semi. He kept a picture of her with him. After Team Rocket was defeated and Giselle was humbled by Ash defeating her with his Pikachu, Joe and Giselle became friends and challenged each other to meet at the Pokémon League. He decided to return to his hometown and start a Pokémon journey like Ash did.

character.name: Utsudon (Jun)
character.description: Joe`s Weepinbell was sent out to battle Misty`s Starmie. Joe thought he had the advantage as grass types should be strong against water types. Misty easily defeated him as her Starmie was a higher level.

character.name: Seiyo
character.description: Giselle is a student at the illustrious prep school, Pokémon Semi, where she is the elementary class`s brightest star. Ash and Brock both thought she was very cute when Joe showed the picture of her that he kept with him. Ash battled her after he got angry at her for her demeaning attitude towards him. He managed to defeat her Cubone without using any Electric moves. After Team Rocket was defeated, Joe and Giselle became friends and challenged each other to meet at the Pokémon League.

character.name: Golone (Seiyo)
character.description: Giselle`s Graveler was sent out to battle Misty`s Starmie even though she knew it would have a type disadvantage. She wanted to show everyone that depending on the levels, it should be able to win. After a quick battle, it was able to defend against Starmie`s water attacks and smash it through the window and into the nearby pool, thereby winning the battle.

character.name: Karakara (Seiyo)
character.description: Giselle`s Cubone was sent out to battle Ash her after he got angry at Giselle for her demeaning attitude towards him and challenged her. Cubone used a `Bonemerang` attack against Pikachu and Ash exclaimed that it was cheating to use projectile items. Giselle quickly responded by saying that it was legitimate move authorized by the Pokémon League. Pikachu managed to defeat her Cubone without using any Electric moves. Giselle was very surprised with Pikachu`s victory because it wasn`t in any textbooks or reference books that she had studied.

character.name: Midori
character.description: Melanie lived in a Hidden Village where she cared for sick and injured wild Pokémon along with a Bulbasaur. After Ash and Bulbasaur worked together to protect the Pokémon from Team Rocket, Melanie suggested that Ash become it`s master since she believed the wild Pokémon were getting too comfortable being under Bulbasaur`s care.

character.name: Fushigidane (Satoshi)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Round 4 - Vs Jeanette Fisher - Grass Field Ash selected Bulbasaur as his first Pokémon whilst Jeanette choose her Beedrill. As the faster Pokémon, Beedrill charged at bulbasaur at full speed, however Bulbasaur mananged to evade and return a Razor Leaf attack. Once again Beedrill used its superior speed, avoiding the Razor Leaf attack whilst also getting itself in a good position to use a Twin Needle atttack on Bulbasaur. Despite being on the backfoot, Bulbasaur managed to dodge the Twin Needle attack and Beedrill`s Stinger. After jumping backwards, Bulbasaur created enough space to be able to use its Leech Seed attack which struck Beedrill on its attacking stinger. Beedril was stuck in Leech Seed forcing it to the floor and Ash had bulbasaur finish it off using a Tackle attack which gave Ash the Initial Advantage in the battle. Like Beedrill, Scyther had an advantage in speed and used this by quickly trying to attack Bulbasaur with its blades. After beeing unsuccessful, Jeanette order Scyther to used a Swift attack which managed to hit Bulbasaur a few times and was useful in deflecting its Vine Whip attack. Jeanette ordered Scyther to use a Double Team attack to which Ash had Bulbasaur to attempt to hit the real Scyther. The attempt failed and Scyther was able to land a few strikes by charging at Bulbasaur and managed to evade Bulbasaur`s counter of a Razor Leaf and Vine Whip attack. Ash had Bulbasaur use its Vine Whip once more but told it to swing the vines towards all of the copies which Double Team created, knowing that Bulbasaur would have to hit the real one in the process. The plan worked and Scyther was struck by Vine Whip, eliminating it from the battle. Jeanette released her final Pokémon of the round which was a Bellsprout. Her choice suprised her a few people including Bulbasaur, as by apperance alone Bellsprout could be considered a weak Pokémon. Ash had Bulbasaur charge at Bellsprout but managed to flip it above its head using its own momentum against itself. Ash was stunned by Bellsprout`s agility. Bulbasaur was angered at being tossed aside so easily and charged once again at Bellsprout, but like before, was thrown away using its own momentum. Bellsprout took advantage of Bulbasaur being on the floor and thrown it towards Ash`s podium, showing great strength and eliminated Bulbasaur from the tie. Ash quickly rushed Pikachu into battle to try and finish Bellsprout off. Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Sand Field) Bulbasaur was Ash`s fifth choice Pokémon in his winner`s trophy battle against Drake. Bulbasaur`s first opponent was against Drake`s Electabuzz. Bulbasuar manage to shake of Electabuzz`s initial Thundershock attack and returned a Razor Leaf attack which struck Electabuzz, although, whilst being hit by Razor Leaf, Electabuzz manage to use a Thunderbolt attack that Bulbasaur quickly dodged. Bulbasaur uses Tackle and causes some light damage to Electabuzz but taking advantage of how close Bulbasur was, it manage to hit Bulbasaur with a Thunderpunch which eliminated it. After Ash had won the battle against Drake he called out all of his Pokémon that participated in the battle on the stage as Drake presented him with the Winner`s Trophy. Then Ash, Pikachu, Tauros, Lapras, Squirtle, Bulbasaur and Charizard all had their handprints set in stone to be remembered in the Orange Island Hall of Fame.

character.name: Daisuke
character.description: Damian was Charmander`s original owner. He abandoned it believing Charmander was too weak to be on his team of Pokémon. Upon seeing how strong Charmander was after fighting off Team Rocket, Damian requested for it to rejoin him, but Charmander ultimately decided to stick with Ash after he, Misty, and Brock took care of it during a storm.

character.name: Hitokage (Satoshi)
character.description: Formerly Damian`s. Evolves into Charmeleon

character.name: Zenigame (Satoshi)
character.description: Squirtle was abandoned by a Pokémon Trainer and managed to form a gang with other abandoned Squirtle that later became known as the Squirtle Squad. The Squirtle enjoyed to play pranks on the locals and even managed to make Ash, Misty and Brock falls into one of their pitfalls. Meowth managed to convinced the Squirtle Squad by sharing some food with him by persuading them that he does not take orders from humans just like the Squirtle Squad. Meowth then managed to get the Squirtle Squad to capture Ash, Misty, Brock and Ash`s Pikachu. However, Ash`s Pikachu was injured by a Goldeen just before Squirtle brough it back to Meowth. Ash was released so he could get a potion from the nearby village but upon his return he found Misty, Brock and Pikachu had been untied. Ash then found out that the Squirtle were only messing around. Jessie, James and Meowth attempted to capture the Pikachu by throwing explosives around the area and managed to set the nearby forest ablaze. Ash managed to shield the leader of the Squirtle Squard from the explosions and returned the favour by carrying him to safety. After saving the nearby forest from the fire the Squirtle Squad was recruited by the nearby village to be apart of their firefighting squad. The leader of the Squirtle Squad was touched by the was Ash treats all Pokémon and decides to travel with him. Round 2 - Vs Nidorino Trainer - Rock Field Ash`s second battle took place on the Rock Field and the battle went down to Ash`s and his opponent`s final Pokémon, which consisted of Ash`s Squirtle and his opponent`s Nidorino. Ash played defensive as he order Squirtle to withdraw into its shell just before Nidorino charged at it and sent it rolling accross the field. Whilst still rolling, Squirtle used a rock as a ramp and was launched into the air which gave Ash the chance to order Squirtle to shoot a water gun at Nidorino. Nidorino was slammed into a rock from the force of the water gun which gave Squirtle the opportunity to land a Skull Bash which gave Ash his second victory of the tournament. Just before the fifth round battle Ash needed Squirtle`s help whilst they fended off Jessie, James and Meowth whilst attempting to get to the stadium on time. This meant Squirtle was slightly tired before the battle. Round 5 - Vs Ritchie Squirtle was Ash`s first choice Pokémon and was pitched against Ritchie`s Butterfree. Both Pokémon traded blows until Ritchie ordered Happy to use Sleep Powder and managed to put Squirtle to sleep which eliminated it from the battle giving Squirtle a quick defeat. Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Rocky Field) Pikachu had given Ash the advantage by defeating Drake`s Ditto but was very Tired. Drake selected Onix and Ash recalls an exhausted Pikachu to be replaced by Squirtle. Ash makes the first move and has Squirtle use Water Gun, but, before it can connect Drake has his onix use Dig and it goes underground. Squirtle headed towards the water pool in the middle of the arena but Onix emerged just before it reached it and then managed to trap Squirtle in Wrap. Squirtle struggled to get free but the Wrap was too strong, however, Ash managed to get Squirtle to use Hydro Pump which managed to strike Onix and release Squirtle from the Wrap attack. Squirtle used Skull Bash on the Onix and eliminated Drake`s second Pokémon in the battle. Drake choose Gengar as his third Pokémon and Ash swtiched in Tauros for Squirtle. Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Sand Field) Ash recalled Squirtle into battle for a second time and pitched it against Drake`s Dragonite. Ash order Squirtle to use Hydro Pump against Dragonite but gets pushed back by Dragonite`s Water Gun. Dragonite uses a Thunderbolt attack which Squirtle sees and withdraws into its shell and even though it took some damage, Squirlte continued to battle. Drake attempted to finish Squirtle by having it use Body Slam, however, Squrtle uses Bubble causing Dragonite`s Body Slam to fail although it then uses Tail Whip and strikes Squirle which then eliminates it from the battle. After Ash had won the battle against Drake he called out all of his Pokémon that participated in the battle on the stage as Drake presented him with the Winner`s Trophy. Then Ash, Pikachu, Tauros, Lapras, Squirtle, Bulbasaur and Charizard all had their handprints set in stone to be remembered in the Orange Island Hall of Fame.

character.name: Squirtle Squad
character.description: Abandoned by unknown trainers. Became Pokemon Firefighters

character.name: Rokon (Moe)
character.description: Macey`s Vulpix was captured by Team Rocket and Ash rescued it.

character.name: Crab (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Ash found out about Gary Oak`s Krabby when he phoned the lab to find out about his Krabby that he just caught on the beach. Both Krabby are kept in fish bowls but it was quite obvious to Ash, after seeing the two and hearing Professor Oak tell him, that Gary`s Krabby was significantly larger.

character.name: Sonezaki Masaki
character.description: Bill is a famous Pokémon researcher who lives at a beach near a white cliff. Ash and his friends encounter Bill as they went looking for a phone for Ash to contact Professor Oak to find out how his Krabby was. After overhearing Ash talking to Professor Oak on the phone, Bill revealed himself by turning on the lights but he was in a Kabuto costume as he wanted to know just what extinct Pokémon were feeling when they lived on the planet. While at the lighthouse, he was waiting for just one Pokémon to show up. One day, he could hear a voice from across the sea so he created a similar sound and sent it across the sea from this lighthouse. That same Pokémon arrived the day Ash and his friends were there but was scared off by Team Rocket. He wasn`t exactly sure what Pokémon it was, but it made his determination to study Pokémon even greater.

character.name: Ratta (Gentleman)
character.description: Traded to Ash. Traded from Ash back to Gentleman

character.name: Pikachu (Vincent)
character.description: Puka is an old Pikachu belonging to Victor. It has the special ability to sense big waves coming from the sea. With Victor, it surfed a huge wave called the "Humunga-Dunga" whilst Victor planted his flag in the top of a rock.

character.name: Magmag (Moe)
character.description: Macey`s Slugma battled against Ash during a preliminary round of the Johto Silver Conference.

character.name: Magcargot (Moe)
character.description: Macey`s Magcargo evolved just after her battle with Ash during a preliminary round of the Johto Silver Conference.

character.name: Lizardo (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Charmander evolved after stopping Melvin`s Exeggutor from charging through a carnival. As soon as it evolved it quickly lost its loyalty to Ash. Ash`s Charmeleon would soon evolve again into Charizard

character.name: Lizardon (Satoshi)
character.description: Charizard evolves from Charmeleon during a battle with Aerodactyl but still remains disobient to Ash. Kanto Pokémon League: Fifth Round - Vs Ritchie. Ash gambled on using a disobient Charizard and he was trailing in the battle and his other Pokémon were tired. Charizard originally appeared like it was not going to do anything but after Ritchie`s Charmander narrowly missed with a flamethrower, Charizard decided to fight back with a flamethrower of its own with panicked Charmander and forced Ritchie to recall it. Pikachu was Ritchie`s third and final Pokémon in the battle and was against Ash`s Charizard which had just forced Charmander to be switched. Charizard trembled the ground with a couple of stomps making Pikachu lose its balance and then blew Pikachu away using a gust from its wings. Seemingly thinking Pikachu was not a worthy opponent, Charizard took a nap in the middle of a battle and despite Ash pleaded with it to battle, it was eliminated. This gave Sparky the victory over Charizard and put Ritchie into round six. Ash angrily recalled Charizard into its ball. Orange Islands. Ash called upon Charizard to battle Tad`s Poliwrath which had a reputation of being a very strong Pokémon. Charizard refused to listen to Ash`s orders and Poliwrath shoots a water gun on Charizards tail making the flame much smaller, then a subsuquent Ice Beam hits Charizard and freezes it. The battle left Charizard very injured and Ash had to keep its tail flame alive much like he did when he first found it as a Charmander. Despite an intial struggle, Charizard saw how much Ash cared for him and once it reached full health in the morning Charizard became friendly with Ash and even obeyed Ash during Battle. Charizard then went on to defeat Tad`s Poliwrath in a re-match. Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Sand Field) Ash chose Charizard to battle against Electabuzz and ordered it to use Flamethrower against Electabuzz, who quickly jumped into the air and landed a Thunderpunch onto Charizard and follwowed up by shocking Charizard with an electric attack. Charizard managed to release himself from the electricity by firing a Fire Spin and then Charizard flew towards Electabuzz quickly making sure it could not use it Thunderbolt attack. Charizard got a good grip on Electabuzz and flew into the air and used Seismic Toss on it which eliminated it and left Drake with one Pokémon left. Drake`s final Pokémon was his prized Dragonite who he sent out to battle Ash`s Charizard. Charizard moved first by using a Flamethrower attack but Dragonite countered by using Water Gun which cuts through the Flamethrower and hits Charizard, who then takes to the skies whilst avoiding Dragonite`s Ice Beam. Dragonite then takes to the sky itself showing great speed as it does so. Dragonite and Charizard exchange Ice Beam and Flamethrower attacks respectively but it is Dragonite who manages to clip Charizard wing using Ice Beam which send Charizard spinning to the ground. Charizard recovers and flies close to Dragonite in an attempt to use a Seismic Toss attack, however, Dragonite avoids and gets a good grip on Charizard which gives it the opportunity to use a Slam attack. Charizard gets up quick although it is clearly tired but it has enough stength to launch a Dragon Rage attack. Dragonite uses the same move, the attacks collide and both Pokémon are sent flying backwards. When the dust settles both Pokémon are standing but exhausted from the previous battle, after a few deep breaths Charizard falls to the ground and is eliminated. After Ash had won the battle against Drake he called out all of his Pokémon that participated in the battle on the stage as Drake presented him with the Winner`s Trophy. Then Ash, Pikachu, Tauros, Lapras, Squirtle, Bulbasaur and Charizard all had their handprints set in stone to be remembered in the Orange Island Hall of Fame.

character.name: Pigeot (Satoshi)
character.description: In a forest near Pallet Town, a bunch of Pidgey and Pidgeotto were being terrorized by a Fearow and Spearow. Realizing that the Pidgey and Pidgeotto were in trouble, Ash`s Pidgeotto evolved into a Pidgeot. Ash and Pikachu climbed on Pidgeot and were able to battle with it to scare off the Fearow and Spearow. Pidgeot was released so that it could watch over the Pidgey and Pidgeotto so that the Fearow didn`t try to attack them again. Ash told Pidgeot that he would be back as soon as he got the Poke Ball for Professor Oak but they have yet to reunite.

character.name: Ghost (Natsume)
character.description: Ash did not "catch" Haunter. Haunter followed Ash to Saffron City. Haunter stayed with Sabrina in Saffron City.

character.name: Kingler (Satoshi)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League - Round One (Water Field) - Vs Mandi Ash`s Krabby evolved into a Kingler after defeating an Exeggutor during a battle against Mandi. Mandi sent out a Seadra in an attempt in regain the advantage in the battle in the water field and ordered it to charge at Kingler. Ash`s response was to have Kingler use Water-Gun on Seadra but failed to land a hit. Kingler switched its attacks to Bubble and managed to send the Seadra skywards. Ash had Kingler do a crabhammer attack and managed to score Kingler`s second victory of the battle, its first as a Kingler. Ash once again stuck with Kingler as Mandi send Golbat out to try and make a comeback. Kingler found itself at a disadvantage as it struggled to cope with Golbats speed and found that Golbat could avoid its Vicegrip attempt with ease. Kingler was knocked onto one of the platforms just above the water level and as Golbat attempted to get close for a Mega-Drain attack it managed to counter with Hyper-Beam which gave Kingler his third victory and put Ash into the second round of the Competition. After the battle a clearly delighted Ash thanked Kingler for providing him with his first ever win in a Pokémon League tournament. Kanto Pokémon League - Round Third (Ice Field) - Vs Pete Pebbleman After both Ash and Pete has lost a Pokémon the battle was now down to Ash`s Kingler and Pete`s Cloyster. Both Pokémon approached each other slowly before Ash order Kingler use its crabhammer attack to which Pete told his Cloyster to withdraw into its shell. Despite seemingly causing little damage, Kingler persisted in hitting the withdrawn Cloyster with Pete unable to find a way to counter. Kingler kept up the barrage of attacks even though it was starting to tire out and eventually it paid off as Kingler cracked Cloyster`s shell, KO`ing it in the process. This victory gave Ash the advantage in the third round and Pete attempted to make a comeback by using an Arcanine. Pete`s choice of Pokémon came to a suprise to some people as the battle was taking place on the ice field. Knowing about Arcanine`s type disadvantage to Kingler, Ash confidently ordered Kingler to use a Bubble attack, however, Arcanines speed on the icy terrain was quick and manage to dodge Kingler`s attack. Arcanine had managed to find some space on the battlefield and launched a Dragon Rage attack which swept Kingler off its feet and into some ice. A dazed Kingler attempted to get to its feet but Ash decided to switch to Pikachu. Pikachu managed to defeat Arcanine which gave Ash and his Pokémon the victory in the third round.

character.name: Laplace (Satoshi)
character.description: Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Rocky Field) After Gengar confused Tauros Ash quickly recalls Tauros and sends out Lapras in the water pool in the middle of the stage. Lapras goes underwater to dodge Gengar`s initial attack and then resurfaced to shoot a water gun directly at Gengar who only manage to get out of the way after taking some damage. Gengar shoots Night Shade at Lapras who counter attacks with Ice Beam, the two attacks collide with each other and the resulting explosion eliminate both Pokémon which meant Drake has lost three Pokémon and Ash had only lost one. After Ash had won the battle against Drake he called out all of his Pokémon that participated in the battle on the stage as Drake presented him with the Winner`s Trophy. Then Ash, Pikachu, Tauros, Lapras, Squirtle, Bulbasaur and Charizard all had their handprints set in stone to be remembered in the Orange Island Hall of Fame.

character.name: Bayleaf (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Chikorita evolved into Bayleef to protect Ash from Team Rocket.

character.name: Hinoarashi (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash was separated from his friends and chased by Team Rocket into a cave where he found Cyndaquil.

character.name: Waninoko (Satoshi)
character.description: Totodile first appeared while Ash and Misty were fishing. Both tried to capture it but it hid in the bushes.

character.name: Yorunozuku (Satoshi)
character.description: After Ash rescued Noctowl from Team Rocket, Ash battled and captured it.

character.name: Heracros (Satoshi)
character.description: In a forest outside of New Bark Town, Ash solved a territory dispute between the local Heracross and Pinsir. Afterwards one of the Heracross who grew fond of Ash and his Bulbasaur decided to accompany him on his Johto journey. Heracross was sent to Professor Oak in exchange for one of his Tauros, however, when Ash wanted to trade back Professor asked for more time to study Heracross to which Ash agreed. Heracross was eventually recalled and it competed with Ash as his trainer in the Silver Conference but remained at Oak`s Laboratory when Ash departed for the Hoenn region. It is a strong, loyal yet slightly docile Pokémon whose feats of strength include lifting a big mechanical Pinsir and defeating Gary Oak`s Magmar at the Silver Conference despite a type disadvantage.

character.name: Gomazou (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash received a Phanpy egg as a prize after he won a race.

character.name: Yogiras (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Larvitar hatched from an egg that he got from Naomi and was to be delivered to Professor Elm.

character.name: Obaba
character.description: Brutella is the cousin of Nastina. Nastina often gets confused for her cousin Brutella and she gets upset when people confuser her. Brutella has a very grouchy personality and she doesn`t get along very well with people. Nastina owned the Beach House Obaba which was located on the beach of Aopulco. She lent money to Moe to help his business. When Ash and his friends arrived, Moe had till the next day to pay back the money to Brutella. She didn`t care if he went bankrupt as that would lower her competition for customers. Team Rocket worked for Brutella to get some money for their mecha repairs but a missle from their submarine severely damaged the Beach House Obaba, leaving Brutella to deal with the mess.

character.name: Obaba
character.description: Nastina is the cousin of Brutella. Nastina often gets confused for her cousin and she gets upset when people confuser her. She has a very grouchy personality and she doesn`t get along very well with people. Nastina was creating a grand resort area called Paradise Obaba which she was the president of. She thought that her resort would be better than the resort that Brutella was making in Aopulco because inside the main structure is a suite room surrounded by the world`s most beautiful coral reef but a bunch of disruptive Menokurage kept getting in the way of construction and all the tourists were going to Aopulco. She had a standing reward of 1,000,000 yen, a year`s worth of hotel stays and fine dinners around the world for a year for the person that could get rid of the Menokurage. Ash and his friends found out that the resort was being built on the coral reef where the Menokurage lived and that`s why they were upset. The resort ended up being destroyed and Nastina was sent flying all the way to Aopulco where she landed right beside her cousin Brutella who was rebuilding.

character.name: Shigeru Ouen Gals
character.description: Gary Oak`s Cheerleaders follow Gary around the Kanto region giving him vocal support during his Pokémon battles. The Cheerleaders enter themselves in the Swimsuit Beauty Pagent in Porta Vista and managed to excited the crowd and Brock who was commentating on the event. Whilst the cheerleaders were ecstatic when Gary won they would also be unconsolable when he was defeated, especially when he lost to Giovanni in a Gym Battle and to Melissa in the Kanto Pokémon League. After the Kanto Pokémon League Gary`s Cheerleader left the Indigo Plateau with Gary.

character.name: Tattu (Kasumi)
character.description: Obtained by Misty.

character.name: Pink Butterfree
character.description: The Pink Butterfree was love at first sight for Ash`s Butterfree when it went looking for a mate in the flock of Butterfree. It tried to impress it with its moves and courtship dance but it was initially unimpressed and slapped Ash`s Butterfree so it would leave her alone. After getting captured by Team Rocket, its attitude towards Ash`s Butterfree changed after it saw just how hard it worked for free it and the rest of the Butterfree. It later decided it liked Ash`s Butterfree and the two of them ended up leaving to cross the ocean and have offspring.

character.name: Casey (Natsume)
character.description: Evolves into Kadabra

character.name: Natsume no Chichioya
character.description: The father of Sabrina who, like Sabrina, has his own psychic powers although they are not as great as Sabrina`s. He recommends to Ash that his best chance of beating Sabrina would be to obtain a Ghost-type Pokémon.

character.name: Golbat (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Golbat evolved during a battle against Team Rocket while trying to rescue Pikachu.

character.name: Crobat (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Crobat stayed at the Pewter Gym while he traveled.

character.name: Kunugidama (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock`s Pineco was caught near Azalea Town with Kurt`s Fast Ball.

character.name: Foretos (Takeshi)
character.description: Brock caught Forretress as a Pineco near Azalea Town with one of Kurt`s Fast Balls while trying to pick Apricorns.

character.name: Natsume no Haha
character.description: Was turned into a doll by Sabrina.

character.name: Kusaihana (Erika)
character.description: Owned by Erika

character.name: Erika
character.description: Erika is the Gym Leader of Celadon Gym located in the heart of Celadon City. Trainers that defeat her in a gym battle are awarded the Rainbow Badge as proof of defeating her. She specializes in Grass-type Pokémon as well as selling and making perfumes. As well as running her gym, she also runs a perfume store nearby where she is the manager. Erika believes that perfume has the effects of relaxing people`s moods, invigorating them and healing their hearts. When Ash entered her perfume store and mocked it as just a means of making guys fawn over girls, he was kicked out of the store and then later out of the Celadon Gym as well. She instructed her subordinates to not allow him to enter the gym because of his perfume remarks. Essence of Gloom Team Rocket heard about a legendary perfume that is made in the Celadon Gym and attempted to steal it. They tricked Ash into working with them so they could enter the gym undetected. They ended up destroying the Celadon Gym in a large fire before they stole what they thought was the formula but instead it was Gloom extract which is used as raw material for perfume. Gym Battle with Ash Since Ash was banned from the gym, he couldn`t challenge Erika to a battle. He snuck in disguised as a girl and called himself `Ashley` (Sato-chan). Pikachu realized it was him and since he was discovered he challenged Erika to a battle on the spot which she accepted. She setup the battle as a 3-on-3 but the battle was never fully completed. Her Tangela was sent out first and it managed to defeat Ash`s Bulbasaur with a Stun Spore, which paralyzed it. Realizing that his Grass on Grass battle technique wasn`t working against Erika, Ash sent out his Charmander. Erika then told Ash she`d give him a Paralyze Heal after the battle which showed her loving and compassionate side. Erika`s Weepinbell was sent out second to counter Ash`s Charmander but its Flamethrower proved to be too much for it. In the final matchup, Erika`s Gloom was sent out to battle Ash`s Charmander and Ash`s Charmander couldn`t stand the horrid smell of Erika`s Gloom and was recalled. Pikachu was going to be matched up with it for the final round of the battle but Team Rocket exploded a bomb in the gym and it caught fire. Everyone except Erika`s Gloom escaped safely, so Ash decided to go in after it as he thought he was partially responsible for the disaster. As thanks for rescuing her Gloom, Erika gave Ash the Rainbow Badge.

character.name: Monjara (Erika)
character.description: Owned by Erika

character.name: Utsudon (Erika)
character.description: Owned by Erika

character.name: Koduck (Kasumi)
character.description: Psyduck pressed the button on Misty`s Pokeball and caught itself.

character.name: Hajime no Haha
character.description: Was searching for Arnold after he went missing

character.name: Hajime
character.description: Went missing after being hypnotized by Hypno`s hypnosis. Ash located Arnold who was then reunited with his mother.

character.name: Rumika
character.description: Jessiebelle is the woman appointed by James`s parents to be his fiancée.

character.name: Yuki
character.description: Suzy is a famous Pokémon Breeder.

character.name: Manami
character.description: Daughter to Anthony

character.name: Giant
character.description: Bound and Tied by Jessie and James just before he entered the P1 Grand Prix.

character.name: Sawamular (Giant)
character.description: Entered the P1 Grand Prix but took orders from Jessie and James as they were dressed as its trainer.

character.name: Anoki
character.description: Entered the P1 Grand Prix.

character.name: Ebiwalar (Anoki)
character.description: Hitmonchan entered the P1 Grand Prix but was defeated by Hitmonlee.

character.name: Okorizaru (Anoki)
character.description: After winning the P1 Grand Prix Ash gave Primeape to Anthony where it would continue training.

character.name: Kantoku
character.description: The construction worker was building a dam in a forest in the mountain range near Fuchsia City. He was getting frustrated with a group of Diglett that were wrecking the road to the construction site, making it impossible for the supplies to build the dam to get there. The construction worker decided that he should call for any able Pokémon trainer who is traveling through the area to help him get rid of the Diglett. He offered a reward of a 6-night, 7-day stay at the famous Giva Hot Springs Resort for the trainer that dealt with the Diglett situation. After realizing that the Diglett were just protecting their home, he decided to call off the dam construction project so that it wouldn`t flood the Diglett and Dugtrio`s home.

character.name: Fuuko Laramie
character.description: Lara owns Laramie Ranch.

character.name: Gardie (Fuuko Laramie)
character.description: Lara Laramie`s Growlithe guards the Laramie Ranch from poachers

character.name: Doriot
character.description: Dario hires Jessie and James to cause an `accident` to remove Lara Laramie from the Pokémon race so he would have a better chance at winning himself. Dario still finished 2nd behind Ash who was riding Lara`s Rapidash

character.name: Dodorio (Doriot)
character.description: Rode on by Dario in a Pokémon race

character.name: Ponyta (Fuuko Laramie)
character.description: Owned by Lara Laramie but rode by Ash during a Pokémon race where it evolved into Rapidash on the final straight.

character.name: Gallop (Fuuko Laramie)
character.description: Owned by Lara Laramie but rode by Ash during a Pokémon race where it evolved from Ponyta on the final straight.

character.name: Tarou
character.description: Lost by his Mother and Father in the Kanto Safari Zone, Tommy was raised by wild Kangaskhan.

character.name: Tarou no Chichioya
character.description: The father of Tarou. Five years ago, when Tarou was three years old, he took his family on a trip around the world. As they were flying a helicopter over the Safari Land, he held Tarou out of the window to give him a closer view at the Pokémon below, but ended up dropping him. Ever since, he and his wife had been searching for Tarou without luck, until someone sent them a photo of a boy resembling Tarou living with a herd of Kangaskhan in the Safari Land Pokémon reserve. Along with his wife, he traveled to the Safari Land to retrieve his son, and enlisted the help of the ranger Officer Jenny and Ash Ketchum. They soon discovered Tarou, but he had already forgotten his birth parents and lived as a part of the Kangaskhan herd. While Tarou eventually regained the memory if his parents, he was too connected to his adoptive Kangaskhan family to want to go home with them. Soon afterwards, Tarou, Ash Ketchum and the others were attacked by Team Rocket, who attempted to poach Kangaskhan using a giant Kangaskhan robot, and together with his wife, he sacrificed himself by running their helicopter straight into the robot, blowing it up and seemingly killing him and his wife. He survived the crash, however, and he and his wife eventually emerged from the wreck dressed in leopard skins, saying that since Tarou didn`t want to move away from his Kangaskhan family, they would live in the Safari Land with him from now on.

character.name: Tarou no Okaasan
character.description: The mother of Tarou. Five years ago, when Tarou was three years old, the family went on a trip around the world. As they were flying a helicopter over the Safari Land, Tarou`s Father held Tarou out of the window to give him a closer view at the Pokémon below, but ended up dropping him. Tarou`s Mother told him not to hold him out the window and Tarou`s Father ended up blaming her that she should have been holding him. Obviously, Tarou`s Mother was very mad with Tarou`s Father. Ever since, Tarou parents had been searching for Tarou without luck, until someone sent them a photo of a boy resembling Tarou living with a herd of Kangaskhan in the Safari Land Pokémon reserve. Along with her husband, she traveled to the Safari Land to retrieve her son and enlisted the help of the ranger Officer Jenny and Ash Ketchum. They soon discovered Tarou but he had already forgotten his birth parents and lived as a part of the Kangaskhan herd. While Tarou eventually regained the memory if his parents, he was too connected to his adoptive Kangaskhan family to want to go home with them. Soon afterwards, Tarou, Ash Ketchum and the others were attacked by Team Rocket, who attempted to poach Kangaskhan using a giant Kangaskhan robot, and together with her husband, she sacrificed herself by running their helicopter straight into the robot, blowing it up and seemingly killing her and her husband. She survived the crash, however, and she and her husband eventually emerged from the wreck dressed in leopard skins, saying that since Tarou didn`t want to move away from his Kangaskhan family, they would live in the Safari Land with him from now on.

character.name: Kaiser
character.description: Kaiser is the Safari Zone warden and is very protective over a dratini that resides in a secret place within the Safari Zone

character.name: Moe
character.description: Macey faced Ash in a preliminary round of the Silver Conference.

character.name: Hakuryuu
character.description: A friend of Kaiser since it was a Dratini. Kaiser recognised the Dragonair after it saw the mark on its horn. This Dragonair rescued Ash when he ran out of breath during an attempt to remove Jesse and James`s dynamite from the bottom of a lake in the Safari Zone.

character.name: Lindow Murasame
character.description: Florinda owns the Xanadu Nursery.

character.name: Masa
character.description: A member of a bike gang and a friend of Jessie and James.

character.name: Golonya (Masa)
character.description: Owned by Chopper.

character.name: Misa
character.description: A member of a bike gang and a friend of Jessie and James.

character.name: Parshen (Misa)
character.description: Owned by Tyra.

character.name: Imite
character.description: Duplica introduced herself as from the House of Imitay which is known for imitating. Duplica likes to dress up and change into costumes so she can imitate people like Officer Jenny and Nurse Joy. Duplica explained to Ash and his friends that she wants to become the greatest Ditto Master and a big star, not a Pokémon Master like Ash. Duplica is known for her perky and curious personality. She also has a large wardrobe of clothes that she uses as costumes so she can transform her looks. When Ash and his friends first met Duplica, she was training her Ditto which was having problems transforming perfectly. Her Imitehouse theater wasn`t getting any patrons because they didn`t want to see a Ditto that couldn`t transform perfectly. Team Rocket appeared and stole Duplica`s Ditto and tried to get it to transform. It wasn`t until Meowth threatened to use its claw on Duplica`s Ditto that it finally was able to transform properly. Duplica`s Ditto tried to transform again and was able to transform perfectly from that point on. Duplica was very grateful and thanked Team Rocket for getting her Ditto to transform perfectly. Duplica reopened the Imitehouse theater after her Ditto could transform perfectly in the hopes that passing travelers would visit and watch her act with her Ditto.

character.name: Metamon (Imite)
character.description: Ash and his friends first encountered Duplica`s Ditto when they ran into Imitehouse to get out of the rain. Ash`s attention quickly turned to a `Pikachu` noise behind him and he was surprised to see another Pikachu beside his own Pikachu. Misty thought the `Pikachu` was cute and she picked it only to be surprised by its odd looking face. Misty quickly dropped Duplica`s Ditto as she didn`t know what`s wrong with the Pikachu. Brock`s first reaction was that it was new kind of Pikachu after he examined it and Ash tried to capture it but Duplica stopped him by throwing a Poke ball at his Poke ball. Duplica was training her Ditto which was having problems transforming perfectly. Her Imitehouse theater wasn`t getting any patrons because they didn`t want to see a Ditto that couldn`t transform perfectly. Team Rocket appeared and stole Duplica`s Ditto and tried to get it to transform. It wasn`t until Meowth threatened to use its claw on Duplica`s Ditto that it finally was able to transform properly. Duplica`s Ditto tried to transform again and was able to transform perfectly from that point on. Duplica`s Ditto can also transform into objects, not just Pokémon. It has been seen transforming into a book, a picture and a canon.

character.name: Akihabara-hakase
character.description: Creator of the Pokemon Transfer System and two Porygon

character.name: Porygon 0 Gou Ki (Akihabara-hakase)
character.description: Created by Dr. Akihabara

character.name: Porygon Shogou Ki (Akihabara-hakase)
character.description: Created by Dr. Akihabara

character.name: Taichi
character.description: Owns an Eevee.

character.name: Eievui (Taichi)
character.description: Mikey decided not to evolve this Eevee despite pressure from his three brothers.

character.name: Mizuki
character.description: Prefers Vaporeon out of the Eevee evolutions

character.name: Raizou
character.description: Prefers Jolteon out of the Eevee evolutions.

character.name: Atsushi
character.description: Prefers Flareon out of the Eevee evolutions.

character.name: Thunders (Raizou)
character.description: Owned by Sparky.

character.name: Showers (Mizuki)
character.description: Owned by Rainer.

character.name: Booster (Atsushi)
character.description: Owned by Pyro

character.name: Roujin
character.description: The Hippie is a calm, old man who plays the PokéFlute. In exchange for his concerts, he expects visitors to repay him with some food. However, usually his visitors pass on by without giving him anything. The Hippie has befriended a Snorlax that eats and sleeps. If the Snorlax is causing trouble (blocking something important), it can easily be awaken with the use of the PokéFlute. In the episode "Wake Up Snorlax!" a Snorlax was blocking a town`s water supply, causing crops to dry out and food to be scarce. The old Hippie used his PokéFlute to solve the problem. The Hippie also has a job of waking up many Snorlax. He owns a device that tells him when a Snorlax needs to be awaken.

character.name: Kabigon
character.description: A friend of the Hippie / Old Man. This Snorlax was blocking the water to the nearby town and needed to hear the Poké Flute to be woken up.

character.name: Yasu
character.description: The Yas Gym Leader contests with the Kas Gym to be the main gym in Dark City.

character.name: Yas Gym Member
character.description: Members of the Yas Gym who help the Leader battle the Kas Gym to be the main gym in Dark Gym. They use various Pokémon such as Mankey, Machoke, Hitmonlee and Hitmonchan.

character.name: Scout no Onee-san
character.description: A member of the Yas Gym who attempts to recuit Ash, Misty and Brock. They are all unsure of joining the gym (as they had just witnessed how much damage their battles do to Dark City) so they give her fake names. The Yas gym recruiter is not seen in any of the battles.

character.name: Kazu
character.description: The Leader of the Kas Gym who contests with the Yas Gym to be the main gym in Dark City.

character.name: Kas Gym Member
character.description: Members of the Kas Gym who help the Leader battle the Yas Gym to be the main gym in Dark Gym. They use various Pokémon such as Raticate, Kingler, Golem and Rhydon. The Kas Gym manages to recruit Jessie, James and Meowth

character.name: Eleboo (Kazu)
character.description: Battles Yas Gym`s Scyther to gain control of Dark City. Becomes enraged when it sees red.

character.name: Strike (Yasu)
character.description: Battles Kas Gym`s Electabuzz to gain control of Dark City. Becomes enraged when it sees red.

character.name: Uchikido-hakase
character.description: Professor Felina Ivy is a good friend of Professor Oak. She lives on Valencia Island where she has a a house that also functions as her laboratory and large forest where she studies and breeds Pokémon. She has three lab assistants: Charity, Hope, and Faith who help her with her research. Until Brock arrived, Ivy was too wrapped up in her Pokémon research to keep her house tidy and she and her assistants nicknamed their house "Our Little Dump". Her table manners are also a bit lacking as she tends to eat fast and sloppily. She is currently collecting data and studying "How Environment Causes Variation in all our Pokémon". She has breed all the Pokémon on the island to help with her research. She is very protective of the Pokémon there and she helped rescue a Radicate without worrying about her safety. Ash Ketchum was sent by Professor Oak to pickup the GS Ball from her lab because Professor Ivy and her assistants were unable to open it and she hoped Professor Oak would have better luck figuring it out. She has written a preliminary report in Pokémon Researchers Monthly on "Pokémon Adaptive Variation as a Function or Regional Distribution". Professor Oak told Professor Ivy that he found it quite persuasive.

character.name: Sophia
character.description: Sophia lives with her husband, Marcello, at the Sunflora Lodge.

character.name: Purin
character.description: Ash, Misty and Brock helped this Jigglypuff sing by improving its voice. Ever since, this Jigglypuff can appeared in numerous places attempting to find someone or a Pokémon which can listen to the whole of its song. This Jigglypuff can be identified by the marker pen it carries which it used to draw on people or Pokémon who fall asleep while listening to its song.

character.name: Minami
character.description: Charity is one of "The Triplets". Professor Ivy`s assistants help Felina Ivy with her research work on Valencia Island.

character.name: Kongpang (Kenji)
character.description: Tracey`s Venonat was first seen using its Radar Eye to track the truck that Team Rocket was driving with Lapras in the back. Its Radar Eye proved to be very effective as they were able to track them down. It later helped Tracey look for Ash, Pikachu and Lapras who had fallen off a cliff. It was positive that they were near the beach on Tangelo Island and its tracking skills were proven yet again as they appears on the horizon.

character.name: Atsumi
character.description: Cissy is the leader of the Mikan Island Gym. Instead of Pokémon battles she tests her challengers in accuracy with a tin can shooting range and in speed with a race.

character.name: Senta
character.description: Ash and his friends first encountered Cissy`s Brother near the Mikan Island Gym. He put a coconut on the ground and as Ash picked it up, he dumped water on him. He has quite a snarky attitude as he made fun of Ash for falling for his trick and told him couldn`t be a very good trainer. Cissy`s Brother challenged Ash to a battle but just as they were about to start, revealing that he owns a Pokémon but Cissy`s Brother`s older sister Cissy appeared and wondered if he was causing trouble as he was supposed to be inside cleaning his room. He tried to defend himself by lying to his sister saying he caught Ash sneaking around but Ash quickly defended the accusation. Cissy`s Brother helps his sister out during the gym battles by using the gyms remote control to activate certain parts of the gym as they are needed. He also started the Pokémon Wave Ride race with a starter gun and cheered his sister on during the race.

character.name: Seadra (Atsumi)
character.description: Cissy`s Seadra was the first Pokémon that Cissy revealed to Ash for their gym match. Ash pulled out his dex and it stated that Seadra`s were known for their horrible disposition but they posesses both strength and speed. After hearing the dex entry, Ash quickly commented that Cissy`s Seadra wasn`t going to win any beauty contests either. Cissy`s Seadra didn`t take Ash`s comment very well and hit him with a Water Gun attack in the face. During the Water Gun accuracy challenge, Tracey was impressed how accurate is was by being able to hit all the stationary cans and the moving ones as well. The match ended up in a draw though as both Cissy`s Seadra and Ash`s Squirtle both hit the final target at the same time.

character.name: Kamex (Atsumi)
character.description: Cissy sent out her Blastoise at the beginning of her second challenge, the Pokémon Wave Ride race but just as she did Team Rocket appeared and captured it in their net. Cissy`s Blastoise proved to be too strong for Team Rocket though as it broke out of their net and then used Hydro Pump to send them blasting off again. Blastoise proved that it was also a fast swimmer and a strong Pokémon during the Pokémon Wave Ride race against Ash`s Lapras. It bashed Ash`s Lapras quite a few times but it wasn`t able to completely stop it. It managed to make it around the flag first but on the home stretch Ash`s Lapras managed to use an Ice Beam to freeze the water so it could go faster and win the race. Cissy`s Blastoise barely lost though as Ash`s Lapras won by half a stroke.

character.name: Rokon Girl
character.description: Quit as Melvin`s assistant as Melvin`s magic show was not very good.

character.name: McGee
character.description: A magician who is not very good at performing in his own magic shows. He asks Misty to become his new assistant after his previous one quit. After his Exeggcute hynotized Ash, Melvin used him to capture several Exeggutor which he planned on using to hypnotized everyone at the carnival so that they would attend his show.

character.name: Tamatama (McGee)
character.description: Owned by Melvin and sometimes used in his magic acts. Exeggcute hynoptizes Ash who Melvin then commanded to weaken some nearby Exeggutor.

character.name: Nassy (McGee)
character.description: After a hypnotized Ash weaken the Exeggutor in the nearby forest Melvin proceeded to capture them. Then, after Jessie and James tied Melvin up, Melvin`s first Exeggcute evolved and tried to protect him. After becoming confused all of Melvin`s Exeggutor charged towards the carnival and it was Ash and his Charmander who stopped them.

character.name: Kiyomi
character.description: Cassandra and her grandmother own a herbal and medicine shop in Mossgreen Village. She owned a Parasect which is able to help with her medicine making

character.name: Obaa-chan
character.description: Along with Cassandra they run a herbal and medicine shop near Mossgreen Village.

character.name: Paras (Kiyomi)
character.description: Cassandra`s Paras is very weak and is defeated by Ash`s Pikachu, Squirtle and Charmeleon. Cassandra wanted Paras to evolve so she can used the Mushroom on Parasect`s back to make a certain type of medicine.

character.name: Parasect (Kiyomi)
character.description: After giving Ash`s Charmeleon a lucky jab, Cassandra`s Paras evolved into Parasect and quickly put Ash`s disobient Charmeleon to sleep. It could help Cassandra make a medicine in her herbal and medicine store.

character.name: Persian (Kiyomi)
character.description: Just as Team Rocket`s Meowth thought he was going to become Cassandra`s new mascot for her company, Cassandra`s Grandmother bring in a Persian for Cassandra.

character.name: Haruka
character.description: Ramona and her brother were traveling to a city near Olivine City to deliver Fire Stones for a Fire-type Pokémon competition when they rescued Ash and his friends from falling off a cliff.

character.name: Tamago (Togepii)
character.description: Found by Ash at a Canyon, this egg was taken care by Brock and then by Meowth for a little while after he stole it. After Ash, Misty and Brock retreived the egg, it hatched into Togepi.

character.name: Doctor Doc
character.description: Dr. Proctor is a doctor who usually treats humans however, after some persuading from Ash, Misty, Brock and Nurse Joy he helps some Pokémon after an accident. Dr. Proctor makes several advances towards women including Nurse Joy, Misty and Jessie.

character.name: Shitsuji (Hontei)
character.description: The butler to James and his family at his home estate. In an attempt to lure James back home the butler is involved in a plot where the parents pretend to be dead.

character.name: Maman
character.description: She is James`s Mother and a wealthy aristocrat. Both of James`s parents want James to marry Jessiebell, a girl they beleive will turn him into a real man.

character.name: Papan
character.description: He is James`s Father and a wealthy aristocrat. Both of James`s parents want James to marry Jessiebell, a girl they beleive will turn him into a real man.

character.name: Ruffresia (Rumika)
character.description: Jessiebell`s Vileplume which she uses to stun James. Jessiebell has owned Vileplume since it was an Oddish.

character.name: Gardie (Kojirou)
character.description: James`s loyal Growlithe has helped save James from Jessiebell on countless occasions. When James left his home, Growlie stayed at home in its own mansion. James later re-encounted Growlie at one of the mansions in the Sinnoh region. It was able to smell James under his disguise. When the treasure chest turned into a mecha, James`s Growlithe was injured by one of the missiles. James told Pikachu to blast Team Rocket off to escape Jessibelle and he said goodbye to his loyal Growlithe.

character.name: Nazonokusa (Rumika)
character.description: Jessiebell has owned Oddish since she was very young. It has now evolved into a Vileplume.

character.name: Keita
character.description: Keita and his Farfetch`d are Pokémon theifs. Keita would use his Farfetch`d as a distraction and then Keita would swap his victims backpack with a duplicate fills with small rocks. When Keita was caught he says the reason he steals Pokémon was because he thought his Farfetch`d was too weak to battle Pokémon normally. After discovering his Farfetch`d is quite strong after a battle with Ash he returns all the backpacks and begins a journey as a Pokémon Trainer.

character.name: Kamonegi (Keita)
character.description: Keita thought his Farfetch`d was too weak to battle Pokémon noramally so he used it as a distraction when attempting to steal Pokémon for himself. After Farfetch`d proved it was strong in a Pokémon Battle, Keita decided to become a Pokémon Trainer

character.name: Biriridama (Keita)
character.description: Keita kept numerous Voltorb as he used them to trick Jessie, James and Meowth that he was giving them a Pokéball. When realising Keita actually gave them a bunch of Voltorb they threw them back at Keita from their hot air balloon.

character.name: Yamaotoko
character.description: A hiker who Ash battles with in the Kanto region. He uses a strong Rhyhorn.

character.name: Sihorn (Yamaotoko)
character.description: A rhyhorn belonging to a Hiker who Ash battles. Its tackle is powerful and shakes the ground when it charges.

character.name: Takuya
character.description: Fiorello Cappucino is a famous movie star who made an appearance at the Princess Day Festival. In addition, the winner of the festival would win the chance to meet him in person which impressed many of the female crowd.

character.name: Beroringa (Teru)
character.description: Caught by Jessie after it ate all of her food she just bought during the Princess Festival. At the Princess Festival Jessie used Lickitung in a battle against Misty where it defeated Ash`s Pikachu, Bulbasaur and Brock`s Vulpix but was unable to beat Misty`s Psyduck who seemed to be unaffected by Lickitung`s lick attack. Lickitung was rarely used by Jessie in comparison to her Arbok, although, it was only by accident that it was traded with a Wobbuffet during the convention called the `Pokémon Swap Meet` when Jessie was knocked backwards into a trading machine and Lickitung`s Pokéball landed in the trading machine next to Benny`s Wobbuffet.

character.name: Caster
character.description: The announcer to the Princess Festival who commentated on the Pokémon battles alongside Fiorello Cappucino. He also reported on Jack Pollockson Smeargle`s.

character.name: Ghos (Junsaa)
character.description: Like most Ghost Pokémon, Officer Jenny`s Gastly likes appearing out of no where and tries to be the center of attention even when Officer Jenny is discussing official police business. Officer Jenny always has to fight with its playful nature so she can do her job. Gastly wasn`t affected like the other Pokémon by Team Rocket`s Hypnotic waves because Ghost Pokémon are strong against psychic type attacks. Gastly found both Jessie and James lying in the street unconscious after Butch and Cassidy kicked them out of their base. Gastly played an important role in defeating Team Rocket by stopping the combined attack of all the controlled Pokémon from hitting Ash and the others. It then broke down the front gate to allow the captured Pokémon to escape the base.

character.name: Masami
character.description: Marissa lives on Sunburst Island with her big brother Mateo. She helps him run a glass and crystal shop. Realizing that her brother needed the inspiration that her Grandpa once got from seeing the Crystal Onix, she decided to send out a message in a bottle to see if people would be able to help her and Mateo find it. The letter she wrote stated: "If you know anything about a Pokémon called the Crystal Onix, let me know right away." Ash and his friends found the bottle near Sunburst Island and then decided to help her find the Crystal Onix as Ash said it wasn`t polite to let a letter from a little girl go unanswered. Marissa went along with everyone as they searched the Sunburst Island for the Crystal Onix. She was a bit scared when they initially found it but was happy that she was able to see it. Marissa was very grateful to Ash and his friends for helping her and her brother find the Crystal Onix.

character.name: Isao
character.description: Mateo runs a glass and crystal shop on Sunburst lsland. His little sister Marissa lives with him and helps him run the shop. When Ash and his friends met him, he wasn`t feeling very well and didn`t want to make glass anymore which was hurting their business. The local shopkeepers were complaining about him because he was hurting their business by not stocking any merchandise which made their stores look bad. Mateo explained that his creations just didn`t have the spark that his Grandpa`s Pokémon statues had as they always looked like they might come alive. Mateo said he just needed some kind of inspiration and he hoped that capturing the Crystal Onix would be that spark. Mateo told Ash that he had looked for the Crystal Onix all over the island but he couldn`t find it anywhere. With the help of Tracey`s Marill, Mateo was able to find the Crystal Onix in a cave in a remote part of Sunburst Island. He battle it but after he knocked it out felt something strange for a minute when he looked at the Onix. He explained that the feeling was hard to describe but he gained the inspiration he need to start working again on his Pokémon statues. As thanks for helping him, Mateo made Ash a small figure of Pikachu.

character.name: Crystal no Iwark
character.description: Ash and Misty first heard about the Crystal Onix when they picked up a bottle in the ocean with a note in it written by Marissa asking anyone if they knew anything about the Crystal Onix to tell her. Tracey explains to Ash and Misty that it`s supposed to be an Onix made of glass crystal but he said he wasn`t sure it was real. Tracey states that there were people who said they`ve seen it but they were only rumors. Ash stated at the time he`d love to see the Crystal Onix and his wish came true when he saw it. Team Rocket heard the rumor about the Crystal Onix from some local merchants and decided they would try to capture the rare Pokémon. The Crystal Onix just hit it with its tail and sent Team Rocket blasting off again. The Crystal Onix lives on a remote part of Sunburst Island in a cave. When the tide goes down, a sandbar appears to let people get to that part of the island. It isn`t afraid of water like most normal Onix are and it often spends time in the underground lake in the cave. Mateo battled it and knocked it out but before he tried to capture it, he felt something strange for a minute when he looked at the Onix. Mateo explained that the feeling was hard to describe but he gained the inspiration he need to start working again on his Pokémon statues thanks to the Crystal Onix. The Crystal Onix then recovered and dove back into the water after Mateo thanked it.

character.name: Maril (Kenji)
character.description: Tracey`s Marill was revealed when Tracey decided that he needed a good Pokémon to help him find the Crystal Onix. Tracey`s Marill has very sensitive ears that can detect distant sounds and the round, rubbery tip of its tail can expand and contract, assisting Marill in the water. While swimming, Tracey`s Marill tail floats so he can see where it`s going. Misty realized that Tracey and his Marill make a good team as Tracey`s Marill could hear a Pokémon long before Tracey could even see it. Tracey would often play a Pokémon cry on his dex for Marill to help it learn what the Pokémon sounded like so it could search for that particular Pokémon. Tracey`s Marill ears would twitch when it was searching or it found something.

character.name: Lizardo (Isao)
character.description: After Mateo`s Cloyster was knocked out by the Crystal Onix, Mateo`s Charmeleon was sent out to battle the Crystal Onix. It used Flamethrower and Ember on it which seemed to be effective and made it super hot and knocked it out. Mateo`s Charmeleon is also Mateo`s glass-making partner. They work together to make the amazing Pokémon statues out of glass that are sold in Mateo`s shop. Mateo`s Charmeleon uses its Flamethrower to help melt the sand they use into glass and to keep the glass molten while Mateo blows the glass.

character.name: Parshen (Isao)
character.description: Mateo came prepared to battle the Crystal Onix with his Cloyster. Mateo thought that the Crystal Onix would be weak against Water attacks but Mateo`s Cloyster`s Water Gun bounced right off it. After trying to use multiple failed Water Gun attacks, Mateo`s Cloyster was knocked out by the Crystal Onix`s powerful Tackle attack.

character.name: Manabu
character.description: Timmy befriended a Meowth after it saved him from a Beedrill. When he is old enough Timmy wants to become a Pokémon Trainer with the Meowth

character.name: Nyarth (Manabu)
character.description: Timmy`s Meowth saved Timmy from being attacked by a Beedrill and then chased it away. After being reunited with Timmy, he wanted to compete in the Pokémon League with Meowth

character.name: Reiko
character.description: This Teacher taught Timmy and other young children at a school. She will yell at her pupils if they misbehave. She booked a Pokémon Trainer and their Pokémon for her pupils to play with on Children`s Day but they could not make the appointment. She asked Ash, Misty and Brock if her pupils could play with their Pokémon instead and they agreed.

character.name: Gardie (Junsaa)
character.description: Officer Jenny`s Growlithe which are regularly used as a part of the Police Force.

character.name: Tooru
character.description: Todd is a Pokémon Photographer would has taken pictures of many Pokémon including an Articuno and an Aerodactyl. He does not like taking pictures of people but after befriending Ash and his friends he took one of them all together as a keepsake. He has no known Pokémon of his own.

character.name: Kyoukan
character.description: The Exam Instructor for the exam to gain access into the Pokémon League. He runs the questions by the people taking the exam and in the 2nd part of the exam he battles them after giving the exam-takers a Pokémon from his collection.

character.name: Zenigame (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Squirtle that was randomly given to Nurse Joy during the Pokémon League entrance exam. Nurse Joy used it to battle the Exam Instructor`s Charmander.

character.name: Hitokage (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Charmander that the Intructor used to battle Squirtle which was choosen randomly by Nurse Joy during the Pokémon League entrance exam.

character.name: Pikachu (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Pikachu that belongs to the instructor in the Pokémon League entrance exam. It is randomly given to James who thinks he can win against the intructors Graveler because he has been `blasted off` so many times by Ash`s Pikachu. After James order the exam Pikachu to use an electric attack on Graveler he shortly lost the battle. He later attempted to get Pikachu to attack the Instructor but Pikachu turned around and attacked James instead.

character.name: Golone (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Graveler belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. This Graveler battled a Pikachu which had been randomly choosen by James. After James ordered Pikachu to use an electric attack on Graveler, it managed to defeat the Pikachu.

character.name: Lizardon (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Charizard belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. James sent Charizard out with Ivysaur but was disqualified straight away as two Pokémon could not battle against the Instructor at the same time. He later attempted to get Charizard to attack the Instructor but Charizard turned around and attacked James instead.

character.name: Fushigisou (Kyoukan)
character.description: An Ivysaur belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. James sent Ivysaur out with Charizard but was disqualified straight away as two Pokémon could not battle against the Instructor at the same time. He later attempted to get Ivysaur to attack the Instructor but Ivysaur turned around and attacked James instead.

character.name: Booster (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Flareon belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. The Intructor used it to battle a Weezing which has been choosen by Ash at random. Ash managed to beat Flareon using Weezing`s smokescreen, smog and tackle attacks.

character.name: Matadogas (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Weezing belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. It was choosen randomly by Ash and managed to beat the Intructor`s Flareon using Weeing`s smokescreen, smog and tackle attacks.
