character.name: Arbok (Kyoukan)
character.description: An Arbok belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. Arbok was randomly choosen by Ash and he used it to battle the Instructor`s Jolteon Jolteon was paralyzed by Arbok`s Glare attack but Ash made a mistake when he attempted to use wrap on Jolteon with its spikey mane. Jolteon used Thunder on Arbok and Ash was forced to switch to Meowth.

character.name: Thunders (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Jolteon belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. Jolteon was used by the Intructor to battle Ash who was using an Arbok which he has randomly choosen. Jolteon was paralyzed by Arbok`s Glare attack but Ash made a mistake when he attempted to use wrap on Jolteon with its spikey mane. Jolteon used Thunder on Arbok and Ash was forced to switch to Meowth.

character.name: Nyarth (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Meowth belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. After forcing to switch from Arbok, Ash used the third and final Pokémon he was randomly assigned. Inside the third Pokéball was a Meowth which he used to battle the Intructor`s Vaporeon. Meowth was defeated by a single Ice Beam used by vaporeon.

character.name: Showers (Kyoukan)
character.description: A Vaporeon belonging to the Instructor at the Pokémon League entrance exam. Vaporeon was used by the Intructor to battle Meowth which had been randomly choosen by Ash. Vaporeon won the battle with a single Ice Beam.

character.name: Chef
character.description: The Chef of Restaurant Hungry who offers customers a free all-you-can-eat deal if they can show him his favourite Pokémon, which is a Psyduck.

character.name: Katsura
character.description: Blaine is the Gym Leader of the Gym on Cinnabar Island. When Cinnabar island started to become overcroweded with tourists he decided to open a hotel near the volcano on the island. Whilst running the hotel, Blaine disguised himself using a wig and sunglasses. Blaine kept a secret battle field inside the Volcano where he battled Ash for the Volcano Badge using his Fire-type Pokémon.

character.name: Kyukon (Katsura)
character.description: Blaine used his Ninetales in a battle against Ash`s Squirtle. After one flamethrower, Blaine managed to defeat Ash`s Squirtle.

character.name: Sidon (Katsura)
character.description: Rhydon was the second. Pokémon Blaine used in his first battle against Ash. Rhydon scored the victory over Ash`s Charizard after it flew away and refused to battle. However, Ash decided to use Pikachu who used Rhydon`s horn as a conductor when using Thunderbolt against it.

character.name: Boober (Katsura)
character.description: Blaine lets Magmar live in the Volcano near his hotel on Cinnabar Island. Blaine calls upon Magmar to battle Ash`s Pikachu which it defeated when Ash quit after Magmar hit Pikachu with a fire blast. When Jessie, James and Meowth attacked the volcano, Magmar help move rocks to stop the flow of Lava. After the Volcano was calmed Blaine used Magmar in a second battle against Ash, but this time against his Charizard. After Charizard used its Seismic Toss, Magmar lost the battle.

character.name: Azumao (Hanada Gym)
character.description: The Seaking at the Cerulean City Gym has only had one appearance in the anime but nonetheless, made a difference in The Misty Mermaid, the episode it appeared in. It was in an underwater ballet written by Violet, one of Misty`s three sisters. At the beginning of the play it was seen among the Gym`s and Misty`s other Pokemon in the giant tank in which Gym battles and the ballet took place. It swam around Misty and danced until unfortunately, Team Rocket stole the show. After Misty`s Horsea used a Smokescreen attack against Jessie`s Arbok in order to evade its Wrap attack, Seaking, without warning or command, came speeding through the thinning Smokescreen and used its Horn Attack on Jessie`s Arbok. After a brief moment, Misty ordered Seaking to use Horn Drill on Arbok. Along with Misty`s Starmie and Ash`s Squirtle, Seaking triple teams Jessie`s Arbok until Misty`s sisters` Seel finally evolves into Dewgong and saves the day, freezing, and eventually defeating Team Rocket. Seaking never makes an appearance after this and most likely remains at the Cerulean City gym.

character.name: Shellder (Hanada Gym)
character.description: The Shellder at the Cerulean City Gym made only one appearance in the anime during the episode The Misty Mermaid. It was in an underwater ballet written by Violet, one of Misty`s three sisters. In the middle of the play it was seen among a few of the Gym`s and Misty`s other Pokemon sleeping next to the giant shell Misty slept in. Other than this short appearance, it really had no other effect on the play or episode, as it was only seen in a couple points as an extra in the play. Its appearance wasn`t significant. It remains at the Cerulean City gym.

character.name: Jugon (Sakura)
character.description: Daisy`s Dewgong made its first and only appearance in the episode The Misty Mermaid. It was in an underwater ballet written by Violet, one of Misty`s three sisters. After successfully attacking Jessie`s Arbok, it evolved and afterwhich froze Team Rocket with its Ice Beam attack. In the end, the show was saved by Daisy`s Dewgong. Unfortunately it hasn`t been seen since and most likely remains at the Cerulean City gym.

character.name: Tosakinto (Hanada Gym)
character.description: The Goldeen that stay at the Cerulean City gym most likely belong to the gym`s former owners, Misty`s three sisters. Their only appearance was made in the episode The Misty Mermaid. During this episode they only played background roles and didn`t contribute much, if anything to the episode. They haven`t been featured in any other following episodes since and most likely remain at the Cerulean City gym.

character.name: Hirata
character.description: Oswald is an exobiologist who makes his one and only appearance in the episode entitled "Clefairy Tales." He is a strong believer in extraterrestrial life and has great interest in finding more proof to support his beliefs, as frequently demonstrated in this episode. However, he is a bit of a klutz and tends to let his interest and excitement get the best of him, as shown during his questioning of witnesses to Clefairy`s earth landing and of Clefairy`s superb technology aboard their spaceship. He ended up blasting off with the Clefairy in their spaceship and landing nearby on earth. Nothing is currently known about whether or not he is still studying the Clefairy.

character.name: Windie (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: During a Gym Battle against Giovanni, Gary Oak choose Arcanine as his second Pokémon after he was forced to switch out his Nidoking against Giovanni`s Kingler. Gary Oak quickly told Arcanine to charge at Kingler and then use a flamethrower attack. Even though Arcanine was at a type disadvantage, it defeated Kingler using a Fire Blast attack. Giovanni`s next choice in Pokémon was Mewtwo who quickly defeated Arcanine using Psychic.

character.name: Viridian City Guard
character.description: The Viridian City guards not only watch over the entrance to the Viridian City Gym but also officiate the matches held inside. The Guards also accompanied Giovanni when he was called suddenly to leave the Gym just before Ash entered.

character.name: Atsuko
character.description: Stella is the ringmaster of a Pokémon circus

character.name: Barrierd (Atsuko)
character.description: After Stella was training Mr. Mime too vigorously for the Pokémon Circus it decided it would no longer take part in the performances.

character.name: Goriky (Atsuko)
character.description: A Machoke that takes part in the Pokémon circus that is ran by Stella.

character.name: Ponyta (Atsuko)
character.description: A Ponyta that takes part in the Pokémon circus that is ran by Stella.

character.name: Gallop (Atsuko)
character.description: A Rapidash that takes part in the Pokémon circus that is ran by Stella.

character.name: Dodorio (Atsuko)
character.description: A Dodrio that takes part in the Pokémon circus that is ran by Stella.

character.name: Monjara (Atsuko)
character.description: A Tangela that takes part in the Pokémon circus that is ran by Stella.

character.name: Tamatama (Atsuko)
character.description: An Exeggcute that takes part in the Pokémon circus that is ran by Stella.

character.name: Magmarashi (Moe)
character.description: Macey`s Quilava battled against Ash during the preliminary round of the Johto Silver Conference.

character.name: Rougela (Santa Claus)
character.description: Santa`s Jynx was separated from Santa when cleaning his boot near the edge of the ice. A piece of ice which Jynx was standing on broke off and floated away, carrying Jynx with it.

character.name: Santa Claus
character.description: Once a year Santa will give away gifts to all good childen who beleive in him.

character.name: Laplace (Santa Claus)
character.description: Lapras safely guided Ash to the place where Santa lives. It can communicate with humans using telepathy.

character.name: Ponyta (Santa Claus)
character.description: Santa`s Ponyta pulls the sleigh when Santa travels to give good children their presents.

character.name: Yadon (Nishinomori-kyouju (5sei))
character.description: Professor Westwood cared for his Slowpoke a lot and he was excited and interested when it evolved because he discovered some reasons why Slowpoke and Shellder evolve together.

character.name: Yadoran (Nishinomori-kyouju)
character.description: After Jessie`s Shellder clamped onto the tail of Professor Westwood`s Slowpoke, it evolved into Slowbro. Professor Westwood took notes while it was evolving and discovered a little about the relationship between Slowpoke and Shellder when they evolve.

character.name: Josei Tenjouin
character.description: The Seafoam Island Tour Guide who takes some residents of Pallet Town to a beach resort on Seaform Island. Delia Ketchum, Brock and Misty all followed the tour guide but Ash was told to stay at home by his mother to train for the Pokémon League.

character.name: Iwakaze
character.description: Potter is a gardener at the Xanadu Nursery who harbours strong feelings for Florinda, who is the owner of the nursey.

character.name: Kusaihana (Lindow Murasame)
character.description: Florinda`s Gloom lives in the Xanadu Nursery and is looked after by Florinda. Florinda was worried for her Gloom when she attempted to evolve it using a Leaf Stone. She blamed Gloom not evolving on herself as she thought that she was not training it properly. Brock stated that the Leaf Stone she had bought was fake but Florinda blamed herself again saying she should not be so gullible. Florinda and her gloom managed to gain some confidence after they beat Jessie, James and Meowth with Gloom`s Solarbeam

character.name: Katsuko
character.description: Katrina met Ash as he was training for the Pokémon League. Katrina quickly challenged him to a battle but Jessie, James and Meowth interrupted the battle before it even began with an attempt to steal Pikachu and Katrina`s Raichu. Katrina then defeated Jessie, James and Meowth with her Raichu. Cleavon saw the results of Katrina`s battle with Team Rocket and decided to offer Raichu the chance to audition for a role for his new film. Her Raichu made it through the initial dancing round of the audition but it walked off stage after it saw Wigglytuff attack some off the auditionees.

character.name: Raichuu (Katsuko)
character.description: After Jessie, James and Meowth interupted Katrina`s battle with Ash a movie director called Cleavon Schpielbunk wanted her Raichu and Ash`s Pikachu to audition for his movie. Raichu made it through the iniial dancing round but after Raichu saw how Wigglytuff treated it co-stars, Raichu decided to walk off the stage leaving Psyduck to get the starring role.

character.name: Heat Minamino
character.description: Cleavon Schpielbunk is a movie director who had previously won the Golden Growlithe award at the flea collar festival. When he met Ash and Katrina he was filming his newest film called Pokémon in Love and offered Ash`s Pikachu and Katrina`s Raichu the chance to audition for a role. Cleavon decided to give the starring role to his new film to Psyuck as it was the only one willing to stay in the audition after the other auditionees walked off stage after they saw how Wigglytuff treated its co-stars.

character.name: Nyarth
character.description: Meowzie used to be a very pampered pet belonging to a rich lady and was even kept in a jewel encrusted Pokéball. Meowth first met Meowzie when he was just a street cat and fell in love with Meowzie. Although, Meowzie rejected him as her owner could buy her anything she wanted and Meowth could offer her nothing. After Meowth attempted to make himself more human by learning to walk on two legs and learning how to talk, Meowzie still rejected him as she thought she had turned into a freak cat. However, after losing her fortunate, the rich lady abandoned Meowzie in the city of Hollywood and Meowzie wandered the street until she joined a local gang of Meowth led by a Persian. It was in fact, the same gang Meowth had been apart of when he was a street cat but Meowth had already left Hollywood by this time. When Meowth returned to Hollywood he was suprised to find Meowzie when the street gang and wanted to take her away. Meowth defeated the gang leader Persian in a duel but Meowzie once again shunned Meowth instead deciding to stay with Persian as it was the Pokémon that took her in during her time of need.

character.name: Meowzie Owner
character.description: A rich lady who owned a female Meowth called Meowzie that she pampered and even bought a diamond encrusted Pokéball for. She was a stuck up lady and even struck Team Rocket`s Meowth (which was then a street cat) with her umbrella because it was attempting to with her Meowzie over. However, after losing her fortune, she abandoned her pet Meowth and left it to roam the street.

character.name: Shiba
character.description: Bruno is a member of the Kanto Elite Four.

character.name: Ebiwalar (Shiba)
character.description: Bruno`s Hitmonchan is only shown once in a televised battle that Ash, Brock, and Pikachu watched together. Not much else is known about it.

character.name: Iwark (Shiba)
character.description: Bruno`s Onix was a wild Onix that traveled on Mt. Hideaway and tried to trample anyone in its path. After Bruno saved Ash after he had fallen into a pit inhabited by it, Bruno eventually figured out what was troubling the Onix. A Sandslash had lodged itself in between one of the Onix` many rocks. After Bruno removed the Sandslash from the Onix, he asked the Onix if it wanted to come along with him, to which the Onix happily agreed.

character.name: Chamise no Babaa
character.description: This old woman lives on Mt. Hideaway and always has her Muskrat meatballs stolen from her. After some investigation, it`s discovered that Jessie, James, and Meowth have been the thieves. She informs Ash & Co about the giant Onix on the mountain.

character.name: Gang Leader Persian
character.description: This Persian is the leader of a gang of Meowth which roam the streets of Hollywood. Persian will look after stray Meowth that his gang find on the streets and took in a Meowth that would in eventually go on to join Jessie and James in Team Rocket. After Meowth left Hollywood the Persian accepted Meowzie into the street gang after it was abandoned after her owner lost her fortune. When Team Rocket`s Meowth returned to Hollywood Persian tried to persuade Meowth to rejoin the street gang and tried to use Meowzie, who Meowth had a fondness for, as bait. Meowth refused the request and instead tried to take Meowzie away from Hollywood declaring that she was too good for this place. Upon hearing this Persian attempting to stop Meowth and challenged him to a duel. Persian lost the duel, but instead of leaving the gang Meowzie conforted Persian in gratitude for taking her in during her time of need.

character.name: Hokuto
character.description: Eve has been an archaeologist from a young age and was made a doctor at just 9 years of age. She has also been given the accolade of discovering the ancient city of Pokémopolis. She has discovered many artifacts which have been linked to the ancient city. However her most important disovery was when she discovered an artifact after Ash`s Pikachu and Brock`s Vulpix blew a chunk of rock away from the mountianside when they diverted their attacks to avoid a Jigglypuff. After Jessie`s Arbok later disturbed and awakened another relic containing a giant Gengar which emerged and started to absorb Pokémon and People into itself. Eve had to quickly solve the riddle of the artifacts to quickly return the giant rampaging Gengar but only succeeded in accidently releasing the Pokémon in the artifact that she found, a giant Alakazam. Alakazam and Gengar started fighting and due to their size and power they threatened to destroy the area. Their fighting was stopped when Jigglypuff`s song managed to awakened the final giant Pokémon, a giant Jigglypuff, who managed to put both the Giant Alakazam and Gengar to sleep.

character.name: Foodin
character.description: An ancient Pokémon with strange marks all over its body, Alakazam is a Pokémon that was worshiped by the people of the ancient Pokémopolis city. After another ancient Pokémon, Gengar, was reawakened, a Pokémon archaeologist was taken control by the artifact Alakazam was in and soon it was awaken also. Both Alakazam and Gengar begun to battle causing distruction to the local area. A singing Jigglypuff managed to awaken a final ancient Pokémon, a Jigglypuff, which then sang to put both Alakazam and Gengar to sleep and returned them both to their relics.

character.name: Gangar
character.description: An ancient Pokémon of Pokémopolis with strange marks over it body. This Pokémon was worshiped by the people of Pokémopolis as a God before the city`s demise. Many years later, Gengar was reawakened by Jessie`s Arbok who disturbed its artifact which acted as an ancient Pokéball. Once it had awoke it started to rampage towards Pallet Town smashing through some powerlines on the way. Although Ash`s Pidgeotto and Brock`s Onix were absorbed into Gengar`s body, they had managed to divert Gengar back to the site where Gengar`s relic had been discovered. Suddenly, another ancient Pokémon was reawakened by an archaeologist called Eve. This Pokémon, an Alakazam, immediately battled Gengar causing distruction to the surrounding area and it wasn`t until the final ancient Pokémon Jigglypuff awoke and started singing that their fighting was calmed and they returned to their artifacts.

character.name: Purin
character.description: Jigglypuff is an ancient Pokémon with strange markings over its body that was worshiped by the people in the ancient city of Pokémopolis and was used to calm the fighting between two other ancient Pokémon, an Alakazam and a Gengar. Many years later, by hearing the song of a sing Jigglypuff the ancient Jigglypuff was called upon again to stop the fighting between Gengar and Alakazam. Its relic was acts as a Pokéball also contains a paint brush which it uses to doodle on the sleeping Alakazam and Gengar

character.name: Saizou
character.description: Otoshi is a Pokemon Trainer that met Ash & Co on their way to the Indigo Plateau. His main Pokemon is a Marowak. After battling with Ash, he admits his badges were stolen. Because of this, his Marowak leaves him in frustration because after all of the hard work attaining the badges, they now have nothing to show for it. After some detective work, Ash & Co and Otoshi figure out that the thieves are Team Rocket and after Marowak returns and a little battling, Otoshi finally gets his badges back.

character.name: Chousadanchou
character.description: These archaeologist are found at a dig site near Pallet town and are led by a well known archaeologist called Eve. The team of archaeologist are quite found of Eve and won`t hesitate to tell passers by and travelers about her acheivements. After awakening the ancient Pokémon Gengar the entire team of archaeologists are absorbed inside Gengar`s body except Eve. However, with the help of the ancient Pokémon Jigglypuff and its song they are saved.

character.name: Dodo (Saizou)
character.description: Otoshi`s Doduo is used against Team Rocket in an attempt to get back Otoshi`s stolen badges. However, it does quite bad in the battle against Jessie`s Arbok and barely escapes being captured by Jessie when Otoshi`s Marowak`s Bonemerang attack knocks the Pokeball out of the way.

character.name: Garagara (Saizou)
character.description: Otoshi`s Marowak is used in a battle against Ash`s Bulbasaur and Pikachu. However, after defeating Bulbasaur, it is quickly defeated by Pikachu. After realising that all of its hard work earning the badges was lost after Otoshi`s were stolen, it left him. After seeing a few random trainers training with eachother in the forest and remembering times with Otoshi, it decides to return to him and ends up saving his Doduo from Jessie`s capture. It defeats Team Rocket quite easily, gets the badges back, and goes on with Otoshi to the Indigo Plateau.

character.name: Torch Runner
character.description: A runner who carries the torch which will light the fire at the stadium which is staging the Pokémon League, signaling the beginning of the tournament. Only participants in the Pokémon League may carry the torch. The flame of the torch is from the legendary flying Pokémon Moltres.

character.name: Tamaranze-kaichou
character.description: Charles Goodshow is the president of the Pokémon League and governs the tournaments held accross different tournaments including Kanto, Johto and Heonn. He is also responsible for the Moltres flame which he uses to keep the torches held by the runners lit. When he saw Ash Ketchum`s spirit and attitude he allowed Ash, Misty and Brock be a runner and hold the events torch lit by the Moltress flame

character.name: Kom
character.description: Mandi is a Pokémon Trainer who was drawn against Ash in the 1st round of a Pokémon League finals tournament held in the Indigo Plateau in Kanto. The match took place on the randomly drawn water field. Mandi is known for his exciting battle styles which has won him many fans. Additionally, Mandi uses this attitude when he isn`t battling and sometimes performs magic tricks to amazing his audiences. Another personality trait Mandi has is that he can be extremely arogant towards people and shown this when he refused to shake Ash`s hand before they battled, claiming that his hands are for holding Pokéballs only. Mandi`s first round battle ended in defeated in a whitewash when Krabby evolved into Kingler just after it defeated Mandi`s Exeggutor. Kingler went on to defeat Mandi`s Seadra and Golbat. The nature of the battle caused Mandi to lose his composure a couple of times and he was very disappointed when he was defeated.

character.name: Poppo (Kom)
character.description: One of Mandi`s Pokémon which he uses during the magic tricks he performs for his fans, sometimes just before a battle. Mandi uses several Pidgey when performing.

character.name: Uketsukejou
character.description: Working inside the Indigo Plateau Stadium, she collects data on the Pokémon trainers that have qualified for the Pokémon League and assigned them their next opponent. The opponents and field type are generated randomly when she presses a button.

character.name: Josei TV Reporter
character.description: The TV reporters and their crew filmed the area around the Indigo Plateau and was broadcasted to Pallet Town live amonst other places. This gave Delia the chance of seeing her son, Ash, on television. TV reporters also interviewed the winner of the Pokémon battles soon after they finished.

character.name: Nassy (Kom)
character.description: Mandi`s Exeggutor is the Pokémon Mandi decided to use first against Ash in the first round of the Kanto Pokémon League. Exeggutor was up against Ash`s Krabby and started off well as its Psybeam to force Krabby to jump into the water. Then, using its Psychic ability, Exeggutor created a whirlpool in the water, trapping Krabby inside. As Krabby struggled to get out of the whirlpool Exeggutor started to bombard the pool using its egg-bomb attack that made Ash attempt to switch Krabby out, although unsuccessful due to the whirlpool trapping Krabby inside. A smug Mandi was caught off-guard when Krabby managed to compose itself, launch out of the water and used Vicegrip on Exeggutor`s leaf, clamping on hard as Exeggutor tried to shake it off. A quick leer attack, followed by a Stomp KO`ed Exeggutor and Krabby had won its first ever battle. Mandi looked on as he watched Krabby evolve into Kingler but quickly regained his flair as he release his second Pokémon, a Seadra.

character.name: Seadra (Kom)
character.description: Seadra was Mandi`s second choice of Pokémon after his Exeguttor was beaten by Ash`s Krabby which, after the victory had just evolved into Kingler. Seadra charged quickly towards Kingler whose attempted to counter with a water gun was dodged. As Seadra got closer, Kingler changed its attack to a Bubble and managed to send Seadra skywards as it could not dodge and maneuver around the attacks. Ash ordered Kingler to use a crabhammer on the airbourne Seadra and knocked its back into the water, eliminating it from the battle in the Process. A clearly annoyed Mandi had to once again calm himself before choosing his final Pokémon, a Golbat

character.name: Golbat (Kom)
character.description: With Ash currently 3 to 1 up against Mandi, it was all up to Golbat to score a comeback in the first round of the Kanto Pokémon League. Ash had stuck with his Kingler that had defeated Mandi`s Exeguttor and Seadra previously. Golbat used its speed effectively against Kingler and managed to avoid its Vicegrip attack. Once Golbat had found some space it used a Wing Attack which slammed Kingler onto one of the platforms above water-level. Mandi order Golbat to use Mega-Drain but as Golbat got closer, Ash ordered Kingler to use Hyper-Beam, hitting Golbat head-on and eliminating Mandi from the competition in the first round.

character.name: Parshen (Seiji)
character.description: After both Ash and Pete had lost a Pokémon each in their third round battle in the Kanto Pokémon League, it was down to a battle between Pete`s Cloyers and Ash`s Kingler. They both approached each other slowly before Ash order Kingler to use a crabhammer to which Pete ordered his cloyers to withdraw into its shell. Despite Cloyster being withdrawn in its shell Kingler kept on using its crabhammer attack and eventually managed to put a crack in Cloysters shell which made it unable to battle any further. Pete recalled Cloyster and sent out Arcanine to try and win the round.

character.name: Seiji
character.description: Pete Pebbleman is a Pokémon Trainer who hails from Pewter City. Making it to the third round of the Kanto Pokémon League, Pete was pitched against Ash Ketchum on the Ice field. After Both Pete and Ash lost one Pokémon each it would be Ash`s Kingler versus Pete`s Cloyster and the winner would take the advantage in the battle. They both approached each other slowly before Ash order Kingler to use a crabhammer to which Pete ordered his cloyers to withdraw into its shell. Despite Cloyster being withdrawn in its shell Kingler kept on using its crabhammer attack With Pete at a disadvantage in the third round battle in the Kanto Pokémon League he turned to his Arcanine to make a comeback. Pete`s choice of Pokémon came to a suprise to some people as the battle was taking place on the ice field. After creating some space for itself Pete ordered Arcanine to use a Dragon Rage attack which clearly dazed Kingler and forced Ash to switch to Pikachu. Just like Pete`s Arcanine, Pikachu proved to be agile on the ice and managed to dodge Arcanine`s Fire Blast attack. In an attempt to slow Pikachu down, Pete order Arcanine to melt the ice field which turned it into a pool of water Arcanine fired one last Fire Blast at Pikachu which it dodged by jumping into the newly formed pool. Ash ordered Pikachu to use Thunderbolt which electrified the pool and Arcanine who was standing on the final piece of ice. Arcanine fell into the pool and fainted, giving the round three victory to Ash.

character.name: Shinpan
character.description: The Pokémon battle referees officiate the battles taking place in the Pokémon League. The make the deciding call when declaring that a Pokémon is fainted and therefore eliminating it from the battle. They can also disqualify a Pokémon or even a Trainer if they are breaking the rules. In the Indigo League the referees had blue shirts on whilst for the final of the Orange League they had Orange shirts on.

character.name: Windie (Seiji)
character.description: With Pete at a disadvantage in the third round battle in the Kanto Pokémon League he turned to his Arcanine to make a comeback. Pete`s choice of Pokémon came to a suprise to some people as the battle was taking place on the ice field. Knowing about Arcanine`s type disadvantage to Kingler, Ash confidently ordered Kingler to use a Bubble attack, however, Arcanines speed on the icy terrain was quick and manage to dodge Kingler`s attack. After creating some space for itself Pete ordered Arcanine to use a Dragon Rage attack which dazed Kingler, forcing Ash to switch to Pikachu. Just like Arcanine, Pikachu proved to be agile on the ice and managed to dodge Arcanine`s Fire Blast attack. In an attempt to slow Pikachu down, Pete order Arcanine to melt the ice field which turned it into a pool of water using it Flamethrower and Fire Blast attacks. Arcanine fired one last Fire Blast at Pikachu which it dodged by jumping into the newly formed pool. Ash ordered Pikachu to use Thunderbolt which electrified the pool and Arcanine who was standing on the final piece of ice. Arcanine fell into the pool and fainted, giving the round three victory to Ash.

character.name: Yoshiki
character.description: (Melissa is actually a male character in the Japanese version) Melissa is a strong Pokémon trainer who managed to qualify for the Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Kanto Pokémon League Tournament: Round 4 - Grass Field - Vs Melissa. It down to the last Pokémon of both Gary and Melissa to see whom would proceed to the final 16 of the Kanto Pokémon League. Towards the end of the battle Gary`s Nidoking faced off against Melissa`s Golem and both Pokémon looked tired. Gary ordered his Nidoking to use a Horn Attack, but Golem anticipated the move and managed to grab onto the horn and maintained a firm grip on it. In the final move of the round Golem used Seismic Toss on Nidoking, smashing it into the rock arena. When the dust settled Nidoking had been eliminated and Melissa managed to progress into the final 16 of the tournament.

character.name: Golonya (Yoshiki)
character.description: (Melissa is actually a male character in the Japanese version) Kanto Pokémon League Tournament: Round 4 - Grass Field - Vs Melissa. It down to the last Pokémon of both Gary and Melissa to see whom would proceed to the final 16 of the Kanto Pokémon League. Towards the end of the battle Gary`s Nidoking faced off against Melissa`s Golem and both Pokémon looked tired. Gary ordered his Nidoking to use a Horn Attack, but Golem anticipated the move and managed to grab onto the horn and maintained a firm grip on it. In the final move of the round Golem used Seismic Toss on Nidoking, smashing it into the rock arena. When the dust settled Golem was standing on Nidoking triumphantly as the referee eliminated Nidoking and Gary from the tournament. The result put Golem and Melissa into the final 16 of the tournament.

character.name: Spear (Kaoruko)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Round 4 - Vs Ash Ketchum - Grass Field Ash selected Bulbasaur as his first Pokémon whilst Jeanette choose her Beedrill. As the faster Pokémon, Beedrill charged at bulbasaur at full speed, however Bulbasaur mananged to evade and return a Razor Leaf attack. Once again Beedrill used its superior speed, avoiding the Razor Leaf attack whilst also getting itself in a good position to use a Twin Needle atttack on Bulbasaur. Despite being on the backfoot, Bulbasaur managed to dodge the Twin Needle attack and Beedrill`s Stinger. After jumping backwards, Bulbasaur created enough space to be able to use its Leech Seed attack which struck Beedrill on its attacking stinger. Beedril was stuck in Leech Seed forcing it to the floor and Ash had bulbasaur finish it off using a Tackle attack which gave Ash the Initial Advantage in the battle.

character.name: Kaoruko
character.description: Jeanette Fisher is a very popular Pokémon Trainer managed to qualify for the Kanto Pokémon League. She is joined by her big cheering squad during her battle for vocal support. Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Round 4 - Vs Ash Ketchum - Grass Field Jeanette made a grand entrance to the grass field complete with a red carpet, flower petals and a cheering squad. Ash selected Bulbasaur as his first Pokémon whilst Jeanette choose her Beedrill. As the faster Pokémon, Beedrill charged at bulbasaur at full speed, however Bulbasaur mananged to evade and return a Razor Leaf attack. Once again Beedrill used its superior speed, avoiding the Razor Leaf attack whilst also getting itself in a good position to use a Twin Needle atttack on Bulbasaur. Despite being on the backfoot, Bulbasaur managed to dodge the Twin Needle attack and Beedrill`s Stinger. After jumping backwards, Bulbasaur created enough space to be able to use its Leech Seed attack which struck Beedrill on its attacking stinger. Beedril was stuck in Leech Seed forcing it to the floor and Ash had bulbasaur finish it off using a Tackle attack which gave Ash the Initial Advantage in the battle. Like Beedrill, Scyther had an advantage in speed and used this by quickly trying to attack Bulbasaur with its blades. After beeing unsuccessful, Jeanette order Scyther to used a Swift attack which managed to hit Bulbasaur a few times and was useful in deflecting its Vine Whip attack. Jeanette ordered Scyther to use a Double Team attack to which Ash had Bulbasaur to attempt to hit the real Scyther. The attempt failed and Scyther was able to land a few strikes by charging at Bulbasaur and managed to evade Bulbasaur`s counter of a Razor Leaf and Vine Whip attack. Ash had Bulbasaur use its Vine Whip once more but told it to swing the vines towards all of the copies which Double Team created, knowing that Bulbasaur would have to hit the real one in the process. The plan worked and Scyther was struck by Vine Whip, eliminating it from the battle. Jeanette released her final Pokémon of the round which was a Bellsprout. Her choice suprised her a few people including her opponent, Ash, as by apperance alone Bellsprout could be considered a weak Pokémon. Ash had Bulbasaur charge at Bellsprout but managed to flip it above its head using its own momentum against itself. Ash was stunned by Bellsprout`s agility. Bulbasaur was angered at being tossed aside so easily and charged once again at Bellsprout, but like before, was thrown away using its own momentum. Bellsprout took advantage of Bulbasaur being on the floor and thrown it towards Ash`s podium, showing great strength and eliminated Bulbasaur from the tie. Ash choose Pikachu to try and defeat Bellsprout which would win Ash the round. Bellsprout started prove a stubborn opponent again as it dodged Pikachu`s Thundershock attack and launched a Razor Leaf attack of its own, missing Pikachu but cutting into some rocks on the grass field which stunned the crowd. Pikachu successfully launched a Thunderbolt attack on Bellsprout, however Ash was shocked was Bellsprout emerged unscathed. Jeanette explained that Bellsprouts feet act as lightningconductors which made it shock-proof. Knowing Pikachu could not rely on its electrical powers, Ash had Pikachu throw and array of punches and kicks towards Bellsprout but none landed successfully. Bellsprout saw an opening and landed a kick on Pikachu which eliminated it from the round. Ash turned to his final Pokémon, a Muk Due to Muk`s slow speed and bigger size it could not avoid Bellsprouts attack but thanks to its slimy and elastic body it was simply able to absorb them and not feel any damage. Bellsprout continued to launch a number of ounches, kicks and throws but still Muk absorbed them all. After repelling a Razor Leaf attack Muk smothered Bellsprout with its body and after a few seconds of struggling Bellsprout was defeated, giving Ash the victory and earned him a place in the final 16. Jeanette picked up Bellsprout and praised it for its great effort in almost securing Jeanette a stunning comeback.

character.name: Strike (Kaoruko)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Round 4 - Vs Ash Ketchum - Grass Field After the defeat of Beedrill Jeanette found herself trailing in the Pokémon Battle against Ash. Like Beedrill, Scyther had an advantage in speed and used this by quickly trying to attack Bulbasaur with its blades. After beeing unsuccessful, Jeanette order Scyther to used a Swift attack which managed to hit Bulbasaur a few times and was useful in deflecting its Vine Whip attack. Jeanette ordered Scyther to use a Double Team attack to which Ash had Bulbasaur to attempt to hit the real Scyther. The attempt failed and Scyther was able to land a few strikes by charging at Bulbasaur and managed to evade Bulbasaur`s counter of a Razor Leaf and Vine Whip attack. Ash had Bulbasaur use its Vine Whip once more but told it to swing the vines towards all of the copies which Double Team created, knowing that Bulbasaur would have to hit the real one in the process. The plan worked and Scyther was struck by Vine Whip, eliminating it from the battle. Jeanette was now down to her last Pokémon and turned towards her Bellsprout to make a comeback

character.name: Madatsubomi (Kaoruko)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League Tournament Round 4 - Vs Ash Ketchum - Grass Field Jeanette released her final Pokémon of the round which was a Bellsprout. Her choice suprised her a few people including her opponent, Ash, as by apperance alone Bellsprout could be considered a weak Pokémon. Ash had Bulbasaur charge at Bellsprout but managed to flip it above its head using its own momentum against itself. Ash was stunned by Bellsprout`s agility. Bulbasaur was angered at being tossed aside so easily and charged once again at Bellsprout, but like before, was thrown away using its own momentum. Bellsprout took advantage of Bulbasaur being on the floor and thrown it towards Ash`s podium, showing great strength and eliminated Bulbasaur from the tie. Ash choose Pikachu to try and defeat Bellsprout which would win Ash the round. Bellsprout started prove a stubborn opponent again as it dodged Pikachu`s Thundershock attack and launched a Razor Leaf attack of its own, missing Pikachu but cutting into some rocks on the grass field which stunned the crowd. Pikachu successfully launched a Thunderbolt attack on Bellsprout, however Ash was shocked was Bellsprout emerged unscathed. Jeanette explained that Bellsprouts feet act as lightningconductors which made it shock-proof. Knowing Pikachu could not rely on its electrical powers, Ash had Pikachu throw and array of punches and kicks towards Bellsprout but none landed successfully. Bellsprout saw an opening and landed a kick on Pikachu which eliminated it from the round. Ash turned to his final Pokémon, a Muk Due to Muk`s slow speed and bigger size it could not avoid Bellsprouts attack but thanks to its slimy and elastic body it was simply able to absorb them and not feel any damage. Bellsprout continued to launch a number of ounches, kicks and throws but still Muk absorbed them all. After repelling a Razor Leaf attack Muk smothered Bellsprout with its body and after a few seconds of struggling Bellsprout was defeated, giving Ash the victory and earned him a place in the final 16. Bellsprout was picked up by Jeanette and was praised in its great effort in almost securing Jeanette a stunning comeback.

character.name: Kaoruko Ouendan
character.description: Jeanette Fisher`s Cheering Squad would give vocal support as Jeanette entered the stadium and during her Pokémon Battles. The Cheering Squad itself is made up of some Cheerleaders, Martial Artists and Drummers. The Cheering Squad would still cheer Jeanette on even if one of her own Pokémon had been elimated.

character.name: Hiroshi
character.description: Ritchie is a Pokémon Trainer who managed to qualify for the Kanto Pokémon League. Kanto Pokémon League: After getting into the fifth round of the tournamnet he met another Pokémon Trainer called Ash Ketchum who he befriended after managing to scupper Team Rocket`s plan to steal the contestants Pokémon. Once receiving the draw for the fifth round of the Kanto Pokémon League Ritchie found out he would be against his newest friend, Ash Ketchum. Round 5 - Vs Ash Ketchum: Squirtle was Ash`s first choice Pokémon and was pitched against Ritchie`s Butterfree. Both Pokémon traded blows until Ritchie ordered Happy to use Sleep Powder and managed to put Squirtle to sleep which eliminated it from the battle. Pikachu lept into battle to try and put Ash back on level terms. Pikachu quickly launched itself at Butterfree and managed to pin it onto the arena floor. Butterfree managed to get back into the air but Pikachu held on and used a Thunderbolt attack to beat Butterfree which put the battle back on level terms. Charmander was Ritchie`s second choice Pokémon. Charmander started by unleashing flamethrower attacks at Pikachu that it struggled to avoid and Pikachu was showing that it was was beginning to get tired. Charmander charged at Pikachu which connected and Pikachu was unable to continue. Ash pondered over his next choice of Pokémon as he knew he was trailing and decided to gamble on Charizard. Charizard originally appeared like it was not going to do anything but after Ritchie`s Charmander narrowly missed with a flamethrower, Charizard decided to fight back with a flamethrower of its own with panicked Charmander and forced Ritchie to recall it. Pikachu was Ritchie`s third and final Pokémon in the battle and was against Ash`s Charizard which had just forced Charmander to be switched. Charizard trembled the ground with a couple of stomps making Pikachu lose its balance and then blew Pikachu away using a gust from its wings. Seemingly thinking Pikachu was not a worthy opponent, Charizard took a nap in the middle of a battle and despite Ash pleaded with it to battle, it was eliminated. This gave Sparky the victory over Charizard and put Ritchie into round six. The two trainers remained friends after their battle. Round Six - Vs Assumpta: It was a close battle after Ritchie`s Charmander and Butterfree battled Assumpta`s Rhydon and Venomoth respectively. Both trainers were down to their last Pokémon and it was Ritchie`s Pikachu versus Assumpta`s Ivysaur. Ivysaur quickly charged at Pikachu who just managed to avoid the attack, however, Ivysaur used Vine Whip which swept Pikachu off of its feet. Ivysaur charged again at Pikachu who tried to halt its progress with a Thundershock but Ivysaur either dodged the attack or defended itself with its vines. Ivysaur then launched itself in the air and launched a Solarbeam attack followed by a tackle attack which Pikachu could not recover from and eliminated Ritchie from the competition.

character.name: Pikachu (Hiroshi)
character.description: Sparky is a Pikachu who is a Pokémon that travels with Ritchie and can be identified from most Pikachu by the long tuff of fur from the left side of its head. Kanto Pokémon League. Fifth Round - Vs Ash Ketchum. Sparky was Ritchie`s third and final Pokémon in the battle and was against Ash`s Charizard which had just forced Charmander to be switched. Charizard trembled the ground with a couple of stomps making Sparky lose its balance and then blew Sparky away using a gust from its wings. Seemingly thinking Sparky was not a worthy opponent, Charizard took a nap in the middle of a battle and was eliminated. This gave Sparky the victory over Charizard and put Ritchie into round six. Round Six - Vs Assumpta Both trainers were down to their last Pokémon and it was Ritchie`s Pikachu versus Assumpta`s Ivysaur. Ivysaur quickly charged at Pikachu who just managed to avoid the attack, however, Ivysaur used Vine Whip which swept Pikachu off of its feet. Ivysaur charged again at Pikachu who tried to halt its progress with a Thundershock but Ivysaur either dodged the attack or defended itself with its vines. Ivysaur then launched itself in the air and launched a Solarbeam attack followed by a tackle attack which Pikachu could not recover from and eliminated Ritchie from the competition.

character.name: Hitokage (Hiroshi)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League: Fifth Round - Vs Ash Ketchum Zippo was Ritchie`s second choice Pokémon and was up against Ash`s Pikachu after it just defeated Ritchie`s Butterfree. Zippo started by unleashing flamethrower attacks at Pikachu that struggled to avoid but Pikachu was showing that it was beginning to get tired. Zippo charged at Pikachu which connected and Pikachu was unable to continue. Charizard originally appeared like it was not going to do anything but after Zippo narrowly missed with a flamethrower, Charizard decided to fight back with a flamethrower of its own which panicked Zippo and forced Ritchie to recall it. Round Six - Vs Assumpta Zippo battles against Assumpta`s Rhydon in the sixth round.

character.name: Butterfree (Hiroshi)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League: Round 5 - Vs Ash Ketchum Happy was selected first by Ritchie and was up against Ash`s Squirtle. Both Pokémon traded blows until Ritchie ordered Happy to use Sleep Powder and managed to put Squirtle to sleep which eliminated it from the battle. Ash`s next Pokémon was Pikachu and it quickly launched itself at Happy and managed to pin it onto the arena floor. Happy managed to get back into the air but Pikachu held on and used a Thunderbolt attack to beat Happy which put the battle back on level terms. Round Six - Vs Assumpta Happy battles against Assumpta`s Venomoth in the sixth round.

character.name: Kamex (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Blastoise was revealed to Ash when Gary sent it out to battle Heracross.

character.name: Blacky (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Gary`s Eevee evolved into Umbreon sometime after he left for his journey in the Johto region.

character.name: Sayuri
character.description: Assumpta managed to qualify for the Kanto Pokémon League and in round six she was drawn against Ritchie. Kanto Pokémon League. Round Six - Vs Ritchie. It was a close battle after Assumpa`s Rhydon and Venomoth battled Ritchie`s Charmander and Butterfree respectively. Both trainers were down to their last Pokémon and it was Ritchie`s Pikachu versus Assumpta`s Ivysaur. Ivysaur quickly charged at Pikachu who just managed to avoid the attack, however, Ivysaur used Vine Whip which swept Pikachu off of its feet. Ivysaur charged again at Pikachu who tried to halt its progress with a Thundershock but Ivysaur either dodged the attack or defended itself with its vines. Ivysaur then launched itself in the air and launched a Solarbeam attack followed by a tackle attack which Pikachu could not recover from and eliminated Ritchie from the competition and putting Assumpta into the Semi-Finals. (On the podium at the end Assumpta`s sillouette matches the girl on 2nd place very well)

character.name: Fushigisou (Sayuri)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League. Round Six - Vs Ritchie. Both trainers were down to their last Pokémon and it was Ritchie`s Pikachu versus Assumpta`s Ivysaur. Ivysaur quickly charged at Pikachu who just managed to avoid the attack, however, Ivysaur used Vine Whip which swept Pikachu off of its feet. Ivysaur charged again at Pikachu who tried to halt its progress with a Thundershock but Ivysaur either dodged the attack or defended itself with its vines. Ivysaur then launched itself in the air and launched a Solarbeam attack followed by a tackle attack which Pikachu could not recover from and eliminated Ritchie from the competition and putting Assumpta into the Semi-Finals.

character.name: Sidon (Sayuri)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League Round Six - Vs Ritchie Assumpta`s Rhydon battles against Ritchie`s Charmander in the sixth round.

character.name: Morphon (Sayuri)
character.description: Kanto Pokémon League Round Six - Vs Ritchie Assumpta`s Rhydon battles against Ritchie`s Charmander in the sixth round.

character.name: Tadokoro
character.description: Umberto lived on an island where there were many Kabuto fossils and he beleived that should the fossils ever be disturbed that the moon would turn red and the island would sink into the sea. When an expedition team led by Nurse Joy arrived on the island, Umberto tried to ward them off the island by attempting to make a boulder fall on the team. Ash managed to track Umberto down and he admitted that he was not trying to harm them, just warn them away. Nurse Joy did not beleive the tale of the red moon and continued looking for the Kabuto fossils. After the expedition team disturbed the fossils the moon turned red and the island began to rumble and the island began to shake. The team did not have time to reach their boats so Umberto told them to build rafts from the trees and managed to sail away from the island along with Ash, Tracey, Misty and the expedition team.

character.name: Josei Reporter
character.description: A TV reporter who filmed the expedition team on an island where they were looking for Kabuto fossils. She was interested in the TV ratings and commentated on all the usual events happening to the team which she later found out was being caused by Umberto who then told her that if the expedition team disturbed the Kabuto fossil then the moon would turn red and the island will sink. After hearing what Umberto had to say regarding the Kabuto fossils she ignored him and continued filing the expedition team Unfortunately for her once the Kabuto revived from their fossils they managed to destroy the camera, however, after she escaped from the island she decided that it would be best if the Kabuto were kept secret.

character.name: Expedition Team
character.description: On a remote island in the Orange Archipelago an expedition team attempted to find some Kabuto Fossils. The team was led by Nurse Joy and a camera crew filmed their expedition and would be broadcasted on the PXTV channel. On their expedition they encountered some strange occurances including falling boulders which they later discovered was being done by a local man called Umberto who was attempting to drive them off the island. Umberto warned the team that they would turn the moon red and the island would sink if they were to disturb the Kabuto fossils. The team managed to locate the Kabuto fossils but upon disturbing the Kabuto fossils the moon turned red and the island began to sink. The Kabuto than managed to revived themselves and swim away from the island.

character.name: Goriky (Expedition Team)
character.description: The Machoke that was part of an expedition team in an attempt to locate some Kabuto Fossils located on a remote island in the Orange Archipelago. They were mainly used for carrying equipment but managed to save the team from falling boulders aswell.

character.name: Sidon (Expedition Team)
character.description: The Rhydon that was part of an expedition team in an attempt to locate some Kabuto Fossils located on a remote island in the Orange Archipelago. They were mainly used for drilling holes in the earth to locate where the Kabuto fossils were buried but they also managed to stop rocks from falling on the expedition teams.

character.name: Gardie (Expedition Team)
character.description: The Growlithe that was part of an expedition team in an attempt to locate some Kabuto Fossils located on a remote island in the Orange Archipelago. They were mainly used for tracking where the Kabuto fossils were but they also managed to detect danger approaching the expedition team

character.name: John
character.description: Roger is apart of a Pokémon show where he provides the voiceover to a number of Pokémon including a Hitmonchan. The Pokémon mime in-sync to the voices and perform a theatrical piece for the audience.

character.name: Ebiwalar (John)
character.description: Hitmonchan is apart of a Pokémon Showboat where he mimes to the timing of Roger`s voiceover whilst performing a theatrical piece for the audience. One piece Hitmonchan performs is a boxing scenario alongside Machoke and Clefable.

character.name: Kay
character.description: Kay is a part of a Pokémon show where she provides the voiceover to her Raichu. Kay and her Raichu were very nervous with each other at first with Raichu`s cheeks sparking when it got nervous and then Kay would flinch at the thought of a potential thundershock. They both got over their nervousness of each other and went on to perform together in the Pokémon Showboat`s performances.

character.name: Raichuu (Kay)
character.description: Raichu is apart of a Pokémon show where it mimes in time with Kay`s voiceover Kay and her Raichu were very nervous with each other at first with Raichu`s cheeks sparking when it got nervous and then Kay would flinch at the thought of a potential thundershock. They both got over their nervousness of each other and went on to perform together in the Pokémon Showboat`s performances.

character.name: Kouji
character.description: Kouji is a part of a Pokémon Showboat where he provides the voiceover to a number of Pokémon including a Machoke. The Pokémon mime in-sync to the voices and perform a theatrical piece for the audience.

character.name: Anne
character.description: Annu is a part of a Pokémon Showboat where she provides the voiceover to a number of Pokémon including a Clefable. The Pokémon mime in-sync to the voices and perform a theatrical piece for the audience.

character.name: Goriky (Kouji)
character.description: Machoke is apart of a Pokémon show where he mimes to the timing of Kouji`s voiceover whilst performing a theatrical piece for the audience. One piece Machoke performs is a boxing scenario alongside Hitmonchan and Clefable.

character.name: Pixy (Anne)
character.description: Clefable is a part of a Pokémon show where it mimes to the timing of Anne`s voice over while performing a theatrical piece for the audience. Clefable watches on the side of the ring as Hitmonchan and Machoke fight. In the show, she is Hitmonchan`s lover.

character.name: Lucky (Pokemon Show no Zain)
character.description: Chansey is a part of a Pokémon Showboat where he mimes to the timing of a voice announcer`s voiceover whilst performing a theatrical piece for the audience. Chansey will also advertise the showboat alongside Mr. Mime and a clown.

character.name: Rougela (Pokemon Show no Zain)
character.description: Jynx is a part of a Pokémon Showboat where he mimes to the timing of a voice announcer`s voiceover whilst performing a theatrical piece for the audience.

character.name: Casey (Pokemon Show no Zain)
character.description: Abra is apart of a Pokémon Showboat where he mimes to the timing of a voice announcer`s voiceover whilst performing a theatrical piece for the audience.

character.name: Barrierd (Pokemon Show no Zain)
character.description: Mr. Mime is apart of a Pokémon Showboat where he mimes to the timing of a voice announcer`s voiceover whilst performing a theatrical piece for the audience. Mr. Mime will also advertise the showboat alongside Chansey and a clown.

character.name: Tsubaki
character.description: Marina is a water Pokémon trainer and has a fondness for water Pokémon over any other type. Whilst traveling around the Orange Islands she and her Tentacruel rescued Misty`s Psyduck from drowning in the sea. After realising Misty was a water Pokémon trainer who also shared a fondness for water Pokémon they became fast friends although they had a Pokémon battle to determine who the best water Pokémon trainer is.

character.name: Dokukurage (Tsubaki)
character.description: Tentacruel is Marina`s Pokémon and because it is a water Pokémon, Marina is very fond of it. Whilst traveling around the Orange Islands she and her Tentacruel rescued Misty`s Psyduck from drowning in the sea. After realising Misty was a water Pokémon trainer who also shared a fondness for water Pokémon they became fast friends although they had a Pokémon battle to determine who the best water Pokémon trainer is. Tentacool managed to defeat Misty`s Goldeen but was defeated by her Staryu

character.name: Koduck (Tsubaki)
character.description: Psyduck is Marina`s Pokémon and because it is a water Pokémon, Marina is very fond of it. Psyduck managed to defeat Misty`s Staryu but was defeated by a Golduck that was taking orders off of Misty.

character.name: Starmie (Tsubaki)
character.description: Starmie is Marina`s Pokémon and because it is a water Pokémon, Marina is very fond of it.

character.name: Joy
character.description: This Nurse Joy visits several small islands in the Orange archipelago. Due to the islands small size they don`t have their own Pokemon Centres so Nurse Joy travels to each island using a canoe.

character.name: Dan
character.description: Danny is the leader of the Navel Island Gym and hands out the Sea Ruby Badge to trainers who defeat him. To obtain a Sea Ruby badge Danny set out a number of tasks for the trainer to complete. Firstly, the trainer must climb the mountain located on Navel Island without using their Pokémon. Anyone accompanying the trainer can use the ski-lift to reach the top. Secondly, the trainer must freeze some water being emitted from a geyser and then use their Pokémon to fashion the block of ice into a bobsled. And Lastly, the trainer must compete in a race in their bobsled against Danny and reach the bottom of the mountain. In addition, three of the trainer`s Pokémon will ride with the trainer in the bobsled.

character.name: Nidoqueen (Dan)
character.description: This Nidoqueen belongs to the Gym Leader Danny of the Navel Island Gym. Danny would use Nidoqueen to freeze water that was emitted from a geyser and then have Nidoqueen along with Scyther and Machoke to fashion it into a bobsled.

character.name: Strike (Dan)
character.description: This Scyther belongs to the Gym Leader Danny of the Navel Island Gym. Danny would use Nidoqueen to freeze water that was emitted from a geyser and then have Scyther along with Nidoqueen and Machoke to fashion it into a bobsled. Scyther would also be apart of the team who rode the bobsled down the mountain using its scythes to steer and brake the sled. Scyther rode the bobled alongside Geodude and Electrode.

character.name: Marumine (Dan)
character.description: This Electrode belongs to the Gym Leader Danny of the Navel Island Gym. Electrode would also be apart of the team who rode the bobsled alongside Geodude and Scyther.

character.name: Goriky (Dan)
character.description: This Machoke belongs to the Gym Leader Danny of the Navel Island Gym. Danny would use Nidoqueen to freeze water that was emitted from a geyser and then have Machoke along with Nidoqueen and Scyther to fashion it into a bobsled.

character.name: Ishitsubute (Dan)
character.description: This Geodude belongs to the Gym Leader Danny of the Navel Island Gym. Geodude would be apart of the team who rode the bobsled down the mountain alongside Electrode and Scyther.

character.name: Grapefruit Island Staff
character.description: Ruby runs the Grapefruit plantation along with her staff which covers the area accross the Seven Grapefruit Islands. The third island is where the plantation is mainly run and Ruby stores the grapefruit here in warehouses. Ruby and her staff take great care in looking after the grapefruit trees and because of this their produce is of the highest quality. When a Snorlax arrived on the island Ruby and her staff rallied together and picked as many grapefruit as they can to make sure Snorlax did not get them.

character.name: Nana
character.description: Ruby runs the Grapefruit plantation along with her staff which covers the area accross the Seven Grapefruit Islands. The third island is where the plantation is mainly run and Ruby stores the grapefruit here in warehouses. Ruby and her staff take great care in looking after the grapefruit trees and because of this their produce is of the highest quality. When a Snorlax arrived on the island Ruby and her staff rallied together and picked as many grapefruit as they can to make sure Snorlax did not get them.

character.name: Senchou
character.description: Captain lived over 300 years ago and sailed around the Orange Archipelago on a pirate ship along with his Gastly and Haunter. Captain was also a champion in the Orange Island League where he used his Gastly to defeat a Beedrill during the tournament. The captain met his demise when a bad storm sank his pirate near Moral Island and the wreckage remained undisturbed until a couple of deep sea divers located the ship and scavenged the Orange Island League trophy which was placed in a museum. Gastly and Haunter awakened from their Pokéballs and rose the ship above the water to search for the Orange Island trophy and replace it back inside the ship as a tribute to their late master.

character.name: Ghos (Senchou)
character.description: Gastly is apart of the Captain`s Pokémon team who won the Orange Island League over 300 years ago. The captain met his demise when a bad storm sank his pirate near Moral Island and the wreckage remained undisturbed until a couple of deep sea divers located the ship and scavenged the Orange Island League trophy which was placed in a museum. Gastly and Haunter awakened from their Pokéballs and rose the ship above the water to search for the Orange Island trophy and replace it back inside the ship as a tribute to their late master.

character.name: Ghost (Senchou)
character.description: Haunter is apart of the Captain`s Pokémon team who won the Orange Island League over 300 years ago. The captain met his demise when a bad storm sank his pirate near Moral Island and the wreckage remained undisturbed until a couple of deep sea divers located the ship and scavenged the Orange Island League trophy which was placed in a museum. Gastly and Haunter awakened from their Pokéballs and rose the ship above the water to search for the Orange Island trophy and replace it back inside the ship as a tribute to their late master.

character.name: Mikeosu
character.description: Mikeosu resides on an island among the Orange Archipelago and beleives strongly that the Meowth of Bounty will visit the island gift give wealth to its followers by using Pay Day. After Team Rocket`s Meowth crash lands on the island the islanders get very excited and tended to its every needs. However, when Meowth explained to his new followers that he did not know Pay Day, Mikeosu began to question his beliefs on the Meowth of Bounty. Shimajio suggested that this could be a test of their beleifs and decided to give Meowth some battle experience on the island`s battle arena in an attempt to make to learn Pay Day. After seeing Meowth getting beaten by an Onix and a Nidoking Jessie and James aided their friend by throwing their remaining money and bottlecaps into the arena to make it look like Meowth had used Pay Day. When Meowth saw the bottlecaps he knew Jessie and James had aided him and decided to leave the island with his friends even though he would of had a life of luxury.

character.name: Shimajio
character.description: Shimajio resides on an island among the Orange Archipelago and is the elder to a group who believes strongly that the Meowth of Bounty will visit the island gift give wealth to its followers by using Pay Day. After Team Rocket`s Meowth crash lands on the island the islanders get very excited and tended to its every needs. However, when Meowth explained to his new followers that he did not know Pay Day, Shimajio began to question his beliefs on the Meowth of Bounty. After seeing Meowth getting beaten by an Onix and a Nidoking Jessie and James aided their friend by throwing their remaining money and bottlecaps into the arena to make it look like Meowth had used Pay Day. When Meowth saw the bottlecaps he knew Jessie and James had aided him and decided to leave the island with his friends even though he would of had a life of luxury.

character.name: Meowth of Bounty Dancers
character.description: These dancers resides on an island among the Orange Archipelago and they beleive strongly that the Meowth of Bounty will visit the island gift give wealth to its followers by using Pay Day. When Meowth from Team Rocket landed on the island they thought that it was the Meowth of Bounty and made his stay on the island confortable for him by providing entertainment.

character.name: Meowth of Bounty Followers
character.description: These followers resides on an island among the Orange Archipelago and they beleive strongly that the Meowth of Bounty will visit the island gift give wealth to its followers by using Pay Day.

character.name: Nidoking (Meowth of Bounty Followers)
character.description: Nidoking is one of the Pokémon that resides of an island among the followers of the Meowth of Bounty. When Team Rocket`s Meowth land on the island and could not use Pay Day, Shimajio suggested that this could be a test of their beleifs and decided to give Meowth some battle experience on the island`s battle arena in an attempt to make to learn Pay Day. Nidoking managed to defeat Meowth after Meowth ran out of energy trying to run away from it.

character.name: Iwark (Meowth of Bounty Followers)
character.description: Onix is one of the Pokémon that resides of an island among the followers of the Meowth of Bounty. When Team Rocket`s Meowth land on the island and could not use Pay Day, Shimajio suggested that this could be a test of their beleifs and decided to give Meowth some battle experience on the island`s battle arena in an attempt to make to learn Pay Day. Onix battled Meowth after hitting it with its tail and then using wrap on it. The battle was interupted when Jessie and James had aided him by throwing their remaining money and bottlecaps to make it look like Meowth had used Pay Day.

character.name: Strike (Kenji)
character.description: Tracey`s Scyther is a former leader of a group of Scyther on Murcott Island in the Orange Archipelago. However, it lost its position as leader when a younger and stronger Scyther defeated it in battle and took over its leadership. Defeated and wounded, Scyther was found by Tracey who managed to catch it despite Scyther putting up a brief struggle. Due to its age, Syther`s wings are slightly shredded and it has additional fur around its cheeks.

character.name: Kanna
character.description: Prima is a member of the Kanto Elite Four who specialises in using Ice-Type Pokémon. In addition to being a member of the elite four, Prima also give lectures on Pokémon battle and sells the recordings at high prices.

character.name: Tsuukounin (Onii-san)
character.description: An unamed trainer who was traveling on Mandarin Island when Ash Ketchum challenged him to a Pokémon battle Among his Pokémon are a Tauros and a highly experienced Persian that knows Thunderbolt. During his battle with Ash Ketchum, Squirtle managed to defeat Persian with a Skull bash after enduring its Thunderbolt. The trainer then used Tauros who quickly defeated Squirtle but lost to Charizard`s Flamerthrower even though it used Take Down on it first.

character.name: Persian (Tsuukounin (Onii-san))
character.description: This Persian is a highly experience Persian which knows Thunderbolt can is quite rare for a Persian. Its Tail sticks out straight which is a signal that it is very strong. During its battle with Ash Ketchum, Squirtle managed to defeat Persian with a Skull bash after enduring its Thunderbolt. The trainer then used Tauros who quickly defeated Squirtle but lost to Charizard`s Flamerthrower even though it used Take Down on it first.

character.name: Kentauros (Tsuukounin (Onii-san))
character.description: This Tauros is a Pokémon who belongs to a wandering trainer who was challenged by Ash as he wandered around Mandarin Island. During its battle with Ash Ketchum, Squirtle managed to defeat Persian with a Skull bash after enduring its Thunderbolt. The trainer then used Tauros who quickly defeated Squirtle but lost to Charizard`s Flamerthrower even though it used Take Down on it first.

character.name: Yadoran (Kanna)
character.description: Prima`s Slowbro is a powerful Pokémon that managed to stop Ash`s rampaging Charizard by using its psychic abilities such as Disable.

character.name: Jugon (Kanna)
character.description: Prima`s Dewgong is a powerful Pokémon that knows Aurora Beam and was seen taking part in one of Prima`s Lectures.

character.name: Parshen (Kanna)
character.description: Prima`s Cloyster is a powerful Pokémon that knows Aurora Beam and was seen taking part in one of Prima`s Lectures. Prima also used Cloyster when battling Ash Ketchum`s Pikachu and defeated it by using its Withdraw to endure Pikachu`s Thunderbolt and then couter-attacked used Rage, Aurora Beam and Take Down.

character.name: Rougela (Kanna)
character.description: Prima`s Jynx is a powerful Pokémon that knows Ice Punch and Blizzard. Prima called upon Jynx to remove Jessie, James and Meowth from her home when they invaded in an attempt to steal Ash`s Pikachu.

character.name: Ralph
character.description: Ralph and his Nidoran♂ lives next door to Emily and her Nidoran♀ on Mandarin Island South. Ralph and Emily shared an ongoing fued with each other as by coincidence they both managed to obtain the same Pokémon at the same time. Ralph`s Nidoran♂ fell in love with Emily`s Nidoran♀ however were not allowed to see each other much because Ralph and Emily were not on good terms. It was not until Jessie, James and Meowth stole both the Nidoran that they decided to work together so they good team up against Team Rocket.

character.name: Emily
character.description: Ralph and his Nidoran♂ lives next door to Emily and her Nidoran♀ on Mandarin Island South. Ralph and Emily shared an ongoing fued with each other as by coincidence they both managed to obtain the same Pokémon at the same time. Ralph`s Nidoran♂ fell in love with Emily`s Nidoran♀ however were not allowed to see each other much because Ralph and Emily were not on good terms. It was not until Jessie, James and Meowth stole both the Nidoran that they decided to work together so they good team up against Team Rocket.

character.name: Nidoran (Ralph)
character.description: Ralph`s Nidoran♂ is nicknamed Tony and is dressed by Ralph in a blue bow tie. Ralph`s Nidoran♂ fell in love with Emily`s Nidoran♀ however were not allowed to see each other much because Ralph and Emily were not on good terms. It was not until Jessie, James and Meowth stole both the Nidoran that they decided to work together so they good team up against Team Rocket. When Tony and Emily`s Nidoran♀ kissed after being reunited, Tony evolved into Nidorino and Emily`s Nidoran♀ evolved into Nidorina.

character.name: Nidoran (Emily)
character.description: Emily`s Nidoran♀ is nicknamed Maria and is dressed by Emily in an orange bow. Ralph`s Nidoran♂ fell in love with Emily`s Nidoran♀ however were not allowed to see each other much because Ralph and Emily were not on good terms. It was not until Jessie, James and Meowth stole both the Nidoran that they decided to work together so they good team up against Team Rocket. When Mary and Ralph`s Nidoran♂ kissed after being reunited, Maria evolved into Nidorina and Ralph`s Nidoran♂ evolved into Nidorino.

character.name: Nidorina (Emily)
character.description: When Mary and Ralph`s Nidoran♂ kissed after being reunited, Maria evolved into Nidorina and Ralph`s Nidoran♂ evolved into Nidorino. After seeing how happy the two Pokémon are together Ralph and Emily built them a house between their own houses so they could both stay together.

character.name: Nidorino (Ralph)
character.description: When Tony and Emily`s Nidoran♀ kissed after being reunited, Tony evolved into Nidorino and Emily`s Nidoran♀ evolved into Nidorina. After seeing how happy the two Pokémon are together Ralph and Emily built them a house between their own houses so they could both stay together.

character.name: Poppo (Emily)
character.description: As Emily was growing up both Ralph and herself managed to coincidently obtain a Pidgey at the same time. This irked Emily and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Poppo (Ralph)
character.description: As Ralph was growing up both Emily and himself managed to coincidently obtain a Pidgey at the same time. This irked Ralph and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Rokon (Emily)
character.description: As Emily was growing up both Ralph and herself managed to coincidently obtain a Vulpix at the same time. This irked Emily and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Rokon (Ralph)
character.description: As Ralph was growing up both Emily and himself managed to coincidently obtain a Vulpix at the same time. This irked Ralph and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Caterpie (Emily)
character.description: As Emily was growing up both Ralph and herself managed to coincidently obtain a Caterpie at the same time. This irked Emily and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Caterpie (Ralph)
character.description: As Ralph was growing up both Emily and himself managed to coincidently obtain a Caterpie at the same time. This irked Ralph and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Ratta (Ralph)
character.description: As Ralph was growing up both Emily and himself managed to coincidently obtain a Raticate at the same time. This irked Ralph and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Ratta (Emily)
character.description: As Emily was growing up both Ralph and herself managed to coincidently obtain a Raticate at the same time. This irked Emily and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Nazonokusa (Ralph)
character.description: As Ralph was growing up both Emily and himself managed to coincidently obtain a Oddish at the same time. This irked Ralph and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Nazonokusa (Emily)
character.description: As Emily was growing up both Ralph and herself managed to coincidently obtain an Oddish at the same time. This irked Emily and intensified their rivalry.

character.name: Sandwich-ya
character.description: The chef of a Sandwich Bar on Mandarin Island South who observed Emily`s and Ralph`s rivalry instensify over the years after they both obtained identical Pokémon and finished equal first in Pokémon Contests. He told the story of their rivalry to Ash, Tracey and Misty as he served them some food.

character.name: Ford
character.description: Ethan is in the service of several local and isolated towns on the Mandarin Island South by providing them with electricity from the number of Magnemite in his collection. Ethan takes his Magnemite in the waste and tundra areas and when a thunderstorm appears Ethan would send the Magnemite into the sky to absorb electricity from the lightning. The Magnemite would act as batteries and provide power to the local towns. Ethan`s Jolteon is useful as a sheepdog and rounds up any stray Magnemite using its electric abilities. Ethans travels in a stagecoach that is pulled by two Tauros. During an emergency where a nearby town was desperate for electricity for the Pokécenter, Jolteon was injured along with Ethan and they had to rely on Ash and Pikachu to deliver the Magnemite which were storing the electricity.

character.name: Coil (Ford)
character.description: Ethan takes his Magnemite in the waste and tundra areas and when a thunderstorm appears Ethan would send the Magnemite into the sky to absorb electricity from the lightning. The Magnemite would act as batteries and provide power to the local towns.

character.name: Coil #6 (Ford)
character.description: Ethan takes his Magnemite in the waste and tundra areas and when a thunderstorm appears Ethan would send the Magnemite into the sky to absorb electricity from the lightning. The Magnemite would act as batteries and provide power to the local towns. Magnemite number six was a rogue Magnemite which would stray away from the rest of the pack and Jolteon would sometimes have to lead it back towards the others. After seeing the rest of the Magnemite being stolen by Jessie, James and Meowth, it evolved and rescued them all.

character.name: Rarecoil #6 (Ford)
character.description: Magnemite number six was a rogue Magnemite which would stray away from the rest of the pack and Jolteon would sometimes have to lead it back towards the others. After seeing the rest of the Magnemite being stolen by Jessie, James and Meowth, it evolved and rescued them all.

character.name: Thunders (Ford)
character.description: Ethan`s Jolteon is useful as a sheepdog and rounds up any stray Magnemite using its electric abilities. During an emergency where a nearby town was desperate for electricity for the Pokécenter, Jolteon was injured along with Ethan and they had to rely on Ash and Pikachu to deliver the Magnemite which were storing the electricity.

character.name: Kentauros (Ford)
character.description: Ethans travels in a stagecoach that is pulled by two Tauros and would let them rest and graze on patches of grass in between traveling and searching for thunderstorms.

character.name: Delibird (Rocket-dan)
character.description: Team Rocket`s Delibird delivers parcels to field agents around the world.

character.name: Big City no Shichou
character.description: When Ash, Tracey and Misty found themselves in the city of Trovitopolis they met the mayor of the city who at the time was running a campaign for re-election. Ash mentioned to the mayor that his Bulbasaur had got kidnapped in the city`s sewers and the mayor replied that he was sending his personal SWAT team to hunt the monster down to stop it from terrorising the city. It emerged that the `monster` was actually a Bulbasaur which the mayor had long abandoned because it would not evolve. Due to his previous cruel acts the city folk refused to re-elect the major and his Bulbasaur was looked after in the nearby Pokécentrer.

character.name: Fushigidane (Big City no Shichou)
character.description: Bulbasaur was abandoned by the Mayor of Trovitopolis when the mayor was a child because the Bulbasaur would not evolve into a Ivysaur. To survive in the sewers of Trovitopolis, the Bulbasaur would use its vinewhip to steal food off people living on the surface. With the strange occurances happening over the city it eventually led the public to beleive that the sewers actually housed a monster. The mayor responded by sending his personal SWAT team to hunt the monster down to stop it from terrorising the city. It emerged that the `monster` was actually a Bulbasaur which the mayor had long abandoned because it would not evolve. Due to his previous cruel acts the city folk refused to re-elect the major and his Bulbasaur was looked after in the nearby Pokécentrer.

character.name: SWAT Team (Trovitopolis)
