character.description: There were many strange occurances in the city of Trovitopolis where several members of the public had their food stolen from them, leading people to beleive that the city`s sewers was housing a monster. In addition, Ash mentioned to the mayor that his Bulbasaur had got kidnapped in the city`s sewers and the mayor replied that he was sending his personal SWAT team to hunt the monster down to stop it from terrorising the city. Jessie, James and Meowth had just been spooked by the "monster" in the sewers and thought that if they made themselves looked scary they could spook the monster in return. However, instead of running into the monster they actually ran into the SWAT team who mistook them for the real monster. The SWAT team fired their glue guns on Jessie, James and Meowth and returned to the surface. It emerged that the `monster` was actually a Bulbasaur which the mayor had long abandoned because it would not evolve. Due to his previous cruel acts the city folk refused to re-elect the major and his Bulbasaur was looked after in the nearby Pokécentrer.

character.name: Ziggy
character.description: Rudy is the Gym Leader of the Trovita Island Gym which is a gym located on an island just off the coast of Trovitopolis. Any trainer who can pass his `attack test` and defeat in in a Pokémon battle will earn the Spike Shell Badge. When Rudy battled Ash, the rules were that Rudy would choose Pokémon of the same type as Ash. So Rudy`s Electabuzz went up against Pikachu, Exeggutor against Bulbasaur and Starmie against Squirtle. Rudy has a Pokémon in his gym that would cover every Pokémon type except ghost (and the new types added in the Gold & Silver generation). Rudy uses dancing techniques to improves a Pokémon footwork and agility. Rudy himself also enjoys to dance. Rudy`s younger sister lives on Trovita Island along with Rudy and a few additional trainers.

character.name: Marie
character.description: Mahri is the younger sister of Rudy and lives with him at the Trovita Island Gym. Mahri and her Seel were both rescued from a whirlpool by Misty and her Staryu. After reaching shore Mahri hoped that Misty would stay on the island with her and Rudy and was dissapointed when Misty cheered Ash rather than Rudy in the Pokémon Gym battle.

character.name: Pawou (Marie)
character.description: Mahri and her Seel were both rescued from a whirlpool by Misty and her Staryu.

character.name: Eleboo (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Electabuzz practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility.

character.name: Starmie (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Starmie practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility. Since Starmie knows electric type moves it is useful to Rudy as he likes to hold battles with Pokémon with the same type.

character.name: Nassy (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Exeggutor practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility.

character.name: Ebiwalar (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Hitmonchan practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility.

character.name: Foodin (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Alakazam practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility.

character.name: Golonya (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Golem practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility.

character.name: Pigeot (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Pidgeot practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility. During a Gym Battle, Pidgeot is also used to carry the referee/commentator above the battle field.

character.name: Sidon (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Rhydon practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility.

character.name: Morphon (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Venomoth practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility.

character.name: Kyukon (Ziggy)
character.description: Rudy`s Ninetales practices dancing techniques in the Trovita Island Gym and uses them during battle to improves its footwork and agility.

character.name: Hide
character.description: Tad is a Pokémon trainer who likes to battle other trainers who specialise in using all-out poweful techniques. Tad`s Poliwrath is a very strong Pokémon that wears a golden belt for being the most powerful Pokémon is Tad`s local village. Despite the type disavantage, Poliwrath beat Ash`s Pikachu and then went on to defeat Ash`s Charizard by using ice beam. Ash managed to nurse Charizard back to full health after the Ice Beam and Charizard began to obey Ash in battle. In a rematch, Ash and Charizard defeated Tad and his Poliwrath.

character.name: Nyorobon (Hide)
character.description: Tad`s Poliwrath is a very strong Pokémon that wears a golden belt for being the most powerful Pokémon is Tad`s local village. Despite the type disavantage, Poliwrath beat Ash`s Pikachu and then went on to defeat Ash`s Charizard by using ice beam. Ash managed to nurse Charizard back to full health after the Ice Beam and Charizard began to obey Ash in battle. In a rematch, Ash and Charizard defeated Tad and his Poliwrath.

character.name: Russel
character.description: Captain Aiden is a firefighter who also trains Squirtle, Wartorttle and Blastoise to aid him in putting out blazes and rescuing for anyone trapped in the fire. Team Blastoise are used for putting out big fires, Team Squirtle is used for seach and rescue as they can fit into small gaps and Team Wartortle are used to put out most fires. When Captain Aiden is not on call he keeps all the Pokémon in shape by having them run around a track or shoot at targets to improve their accuracy.

character.name: Team Kameil
character.description: Under Captain Aiden the Wartortle are used as his main firefighters. When they are not on call the Wartortle train hard to stay in shape.

character.name: Team Kamex
character.description: Under Captain Aiden the Blastoise are used as firefighters who are used when dealing with big fires as their water cannons can unleash a lot of water. When they are not on call the Blastoise train hard to stay in shape.

character.name: Team Zenigame
character.description: Under Captain Aiden the Squirtle are used as seach and rescue firefighters as they can fit into small spaces. When they are not on call the Squirtle train hard to stay in shape.

character.name: Kameil (Russel)
character.description: This Wartortle is the strongest of the Wartortle that serve under Captain Aiden in the Pokémon Firefighters. Under Captain Aiden the Wartortle are used as his main firefighters. When they are not on call the Wartortle train hard to stay in shape.

character.name: Captain Aidan`s Assistant
character.description: Captain Aidan has an assistant who helps run the training sessions to keep the Pokémon in top shape when they are not on duty.

character.name: Junji
character.description: Gulzar claims he is the best Grass-Type Pokémon trainer in the Orange Islands. He ended up challenging Ash to a battle and used his Gloom. Ash responded by wanting to use his Charizard but actually used his Squirtle by mistake. Gloom was highly resistant to Squirtle`s Water Gun attack and forced Ash to switch Pokémon. Once again Ash wanted to choose Charizard but sent out Snorlax by accident. Gloom used solarbeam on the sleeping Snorlax but only managed to wake it up. Ash`s Snorlax tried to eat his Gloom, actually ate the flowers he kept in his headband and ate his lunch. Gulzar withdrew Gloom and just before he ran away, Gulzar pointed out where the nearest Pokécentre was to Ash.

character.name: Kusaihana (Junji)
character.description: Gulzar claims he is the best Grass-Type Pokémon trainer in the Orange Islands. He ended up challenging Ash to a battle and used his Gloom. Ash responded by wanting to use his Charizard but actually used his Squirtle by mistake. Gloom was highly resistant to Squirtle`s Water Gun attack and forced Ash to switch Pokémon. Once again Ash wanted to choose Charizard but sent out Snorlax by accident. Gloom used solarbeam on the sleeping Snorlax but only managed to wake it up. Ash`s Snorlax tried to eat his Gloom, actually ate the flowers he kept in his headband and ate his lunch. Gulzar withdrew Gloom and then ran away.

character.name: Ruriko
character.description: Luana is the owner of a grand hotel on Kumquat Island which allows its visitor to relax in luxury and even contrains a dance studio and workout gym for Pokémon. Luana is also the Gym Leader for Kumquat island and her hotel doubles up as a Gym Arena where she likes to hold double battle against any challengers. Luana has a son called Travis who is traveling as a Pokémon trainer. He bears a striking resemblance to Ash Ketchum and even carries a Pikachu around on his shoulder.

character.name: Foodin (Ruriko)
character.description: Alakazam takes part in double battles for Luana at the Kumquat Island Gym. It will often be paired up against Marowak. The two Pokémon work well together as Marowak will use Bonemerang after Alakazam has used its psychic abilities to keep the target still.

character.name: Garagara (Ruriko)
character.description: Marowak takes part in double battles for Luana at the Kumquat Island Gym. It will often be paired up against Alakazam. The two Pokémon work well together as Marowak will use Bonemerang after Alakazam has used its psychic abilities to keep the target still.

character.name: Manager
character.description: Sheldon is the hotel manager of Luana`s grand hotel on Kumquat Island and works hard to ensure the customer`s get satisfaction during their stay. Sheldon will also act as a referee during Luana`s Gym battles.

character.name: Kouji
character.description: Luana has a son called Travis who is traveling as a Pokémon trainer. He bears a striking resemblance to Ash Ketchum and even carries a Pikachu around on his shoulder.

character.name: Pikachu (Kouji)
character.description: Simular to Ash Ketchum, Travis carries his Pikachu around on his shoulder.

character.name: Midorikawa
character.description: Dr. Quincy T. Quackenpoker is a Pokémon Researcher who has a particular interest in watching Magikarp during there evolution season in the Orange Islands. He places band on the Magikarp so he can determine how many times they revisit the island and counts how many evolve into a Gyarodos as they leave.

character.name: Nyoromo (Kasumi)
character.description: Misty befriended Poliwag as she was searching for Salveyo weed to cure Ash and Tracey from Vileplume`s Stun Spore. Poliwag decided to stay with Misty after Ash and Tracey recovered.

character.name: Ojisan
character.description: The Orange League Administrator check any challengers badges to make sure they are official and their other duties involve showing challengers to the Stadium and around the Hall of Fame building.

character.name: Yuuji
character.description: Drake is the leader of the Orange Crew and accepts challenges from Pokémon trainers who manage to obtain four Gym Badges from the Gym Leaders on the Orange Islands. Recently Drake was becoming bored on Pummelo Island as he had not battled a decent trainer in a long time and wondered whether anyone could actually beat him and his prized Pokémon, Dragonite.

character.name: Metamon (Yuuji)
character.description: Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Rocky Field) Drake selected the first Pokémon in the battle and selected Ditto who the commentator pointed out that many trainers had lost their cool against ditto as they got frustration seeing their own attacks being launch against them. Ash responded by sending out Pikachu and Drake`s first move was to have Ditto transform into Pikachu. Ash`s first move was a Thunder attack but the transformed Ditto manage to shrug it off and launch a Thunder attack of its own that hit Ash`s Pikachu. Both trainers then order their Pokémon to use a Thunderbolt attack that struck each other and the power caused the rocks they were standing on to collaspe. Drake`s Ditto managed to land on its feet but Ash`s Pikachu fell on the arena floor. Pikachu struggled to get and Misty wanted Ash to switch Pokémon, however, Ash refused to beleive that Ditto, who was copying Pikachu, could beat the original. Ash stuck with Pikachu and Drake ordered his Ditto to use agility. Ash responded by having Pikachu use Thunderbolt but Ditto dodged it and launched a Thunderbolt attack of its own. Ash had Pikachu ground itself and took no damage from the attack, then, Pikachu used Agility to get close to Drake`s Ditto who was also using Agility and both Pokémon used Thunderbolt and collided in mid-air. Pikachu was the first Pokémon to get to its feet and swiped at Ditto using its tail whilst charged with electricity, knocking Ditto to the floor and eliminating it from the battle giving Ash the initial advantage.

character.name: Iwark (Yuuji)
character.description: Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Rocky Field) Pikachu had given Ash the advantage by defeating Drake`s Ditto but was very Tired. Drake selected Onix and Ash recalls an exhausted Pikachu to be replaced by Squirtle. Ash makes the first move and has Squirtle use Water Gun, but, before it can connect Drake has his onix use Dig and it goes underground. Squirtle headed towards the water pool in the middle of the arena but Onix emerged just before it reached it and then managed to trap Squirtle in Wrap. Squirtle struggled to get free but the Wrap was too strong, however, Ash managed to get Squirtle to use Hydro Pump which managed to strike Onix and release Squirtle from the Wrap attack. Squirtle used Skull Bash on the Onix and eliminated Drake`s second Pokémon in the battle.

character.name: Odamaki-hakase
character.description: Professor Birch is a Pokémon Professor living in Littleroot Town who is renounced throughout Hoenn.

character.name: Gangar (Yuuji)
character.description: Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Rocky Field) Ash chooses Tauros as his third Pokémon to go against Drake`s Gengar. Ash tells Tauros to begin with Fissure but Gengar jumps into the air and avoids the attack. Whilst in the air Gengar uses Confuse Ray which makes Tauros attack the nearby rock and damage itself in the process. Ash quickly recalls Tauros and sends out Lapras in the water pool in the middle of the stage. Ash quickly recalls Tauros and sends out Lapras in the water pool in the middle of the stage. Lapras goes underwater to dodge Gengar`s initial attack and then resurfaced to shoot a water gun directly at Gengar who only manage to get out of the way after taking some damage. Gengar shoots Night Shade at Lapras who counter attacks with Ice Beam, the two attacks collide with each other and the resulting explosion eliminate both Pokémon which meant Drake has lost three Pokémon and Ash had only lost one.

character.name: Hazuki
character.description: Harrison attempted to ward off a wild Sneasel that was guarding the sacred Ho-Oh flame.

character.name: Bursyamo (Hazuki)
character.description: Harrison used Blaziken to capture a Sneasel that was blocking the Sacred Flame of Ho-Oh.

character.name: Fushigibana (Yuuji)
character.description: Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Sand Field) With Drake losing his third Pokémon there was a short interval whilst the battle field change into a sandy field. The interval ended and Drake began by choosing Venusaur whilst Ash brought Tauros back into the battle who had now recovered from Gengar`s Confuse Ray. Ash`s first move was to have Tauros stamp its feet to use Fissure, however, the soft sand absorbed the move. Drake took advantage of the situation by having Venusaur use Solarbeam but knowing Solarbeam takes a while to charge up, Ash have Tauros charge straight towards Drake`s Venusaur and flip it into the air just before it fired. Venusaur managed to adjust itself mid-air and fire the Solarbeam at Tauros. The impact was close to Tauros and knocked it down but it managed to recover and get back to its feet quickly. Venusaur struck Tauros with one of its Vine Whip attacks but Tauros manage to avoid any further strikes and successfully land a Take Down move on Venusaur and eliminate it from the battle.

character.name: Eleboo (Yuuji)
character.description: Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Sand Field) Electabuzz was Drake`s fifth choice Pokémon in his winner`s trophy battle against Ash. Electabuzz`s first opponent was against Ash`s Bulbasaur. Bulbasuar manage to shake of Electabuzz`s initial Thundershock attack and returned a Razor Leaf attack which struck Electabuzz, although, whilst being hit by Razor Leaf, Electabuzz manage to use a Thunderbolt attack that Bulbasaur quickly dodged. Bulbasaur uses Tackle and causes some light damage to Electabuzz but taking advantage of how close Bulbasur was, it manage to hit Bulbasaur with a Thunderpunch which eliminated it. Ash chose Charizard to battle against Electabuzz and ordered it to use Flamethrower against Electabuzz, who quickly jumped into the air and landed a Thunderpunch onto Charizard and follwowed up by shocking Charizard with an electric attack. Charizard managed to release himself from the electricity by firing a Fire Spin and then Charizard flew towards Electabuzz quickly making sure it could not use it Thunderbolt attack. Charizard got a good grip on Electabuzz and flew into the air and used Seismic Toss on it which eliminated it and left Drake with one Pokémon left.

character.name: Kairyu (Yuuji)
character.description: Orange League Final - Vs. Ash Ketchum (Sand Field) Drake`s final Pokémon was his prized Dragonite who he sent out to battle Ash`s Charizard. Charizard moved first by using a Flamethrower attack but Dragonite countered by using Water Gun which cuts through the Flamethrower and hits Charizard, who then takes to the skies whilst avoiding Dragonite`s Ice Beam. Dragonite then takes to the sky itself showing great speed as it does so. Dragonite and Charizard exchange Ice Beam and Flamethrower attacks respectively but it is Dragonite who manages to clip Charizard wing using Ice Beam which send Charizard spinning to the ground. Charizard recovers and flies close to Dragonite in an attempt to use a Seismic Toss attack, however, Dragonite avoids and gets a good grip on Charizard which gives it the opportunity to use a Slam attack. Charizard gets up quick although it is clearly tired but it has enough stength to launch a Dragon Rage attack. Dragonite uses the same move, the attacks collide and both Pokémon are sent flying backwards. When the dust settles both Pokémon are standing but exhausted from the previous battle, after a few deep breaths Charizard falls to the ground and is eliminated. Ash recalled Squirtle into battle for a second time and pitched it against Drake`s Dragonite. Ash order Squirtle to use Hydro Pump against Dragonite but gets pushed back by Dragonite`s Water Gun. Dragonite uses a Thunderbolt attack which Squirtle sees and withdraws into its shell and even though it took some damage, Squirlte continued to battle. Drake attempted to finish Squirtle by having it use Body Slam, however, Squrtle uses Bubble causing Dragonite`s Body Slam to fail although it then uses Tail Whip and strikes Squirle which then eliminates it from the battle. Tauros was switched in again after Ash recalled the eliminated Squirtle. Tauros charged into the middle of the field whilst Dragonite flew up and use Body Slam. To Drake`s suprise Ash told Tauros to stand its ground and endure the hit, which it does so successfully and even manages to throw Dragonite to the floor using its horns. Dragonite get up and uses Thunderbolt which proves too much for Tauros and eliminates it from the battle leaving Ash with one Pokémon left. Ash was left with his Pikachu and sent it out against Dragonite that had already taken down three of his Pokémon in a row. Ash began by having Pikachu use Agility although Dragonite shown its speed also by striking Pikachu with its tail and sends Pikachu into the sand. Dragonite attempts to end the battle with a Hype Beam but at the last second Pikachu uses its tail as a spring and jumps to avoid the powerful attack. Dragonite was tired after using Hyper Beam and gave Pikachu the chance to land right on top of its head. Pikachu used a Thunder attack which could be seen from outside of the arena. Dragonite managed to shake Pikachu off and stay on its feet, but after a few deep breaths and fell to the arena floor from the sheer amount damage taken during the battle. Dragonite was eliminated and Ash won the battle and claimed the Winner`s Trophy.

character.name: Debo
character.description: Captain Crook leads a group of pirates who poach Pokémon at sea even if they are not allowed to. His first mate, Scuz, keeps an eye out for any Pokémon on the horizon. Captain Crook uses the ship`s cannons to fire Pokéballs containing Tentacruel as well as normal Canonballs. Ash Ketchum and Misty manage to capture Captain Crook and his crew and Officer Jenny arrested them. The Tentacruel belonging to Captain Crook were released into the wild.

character.name: Ghali
character.description: Scuz is the first mate of a pirate by the name of Captain Crook and will keep a lookout for any Pokémon that they can poach. Scuz is loyal to his captain by following all of his orders and will salute his captain with both hands at the same time. Ash Ketchum and Misty manage to capture Captain Crook and his crew and Officer Jenny arrested them. The Tentacruel belonging to Captain Crook were released into the wild.

character.name: Dokukurage (Debo)
character.description: Captain Crook`s Tentacruel are used to poach any Pokémon that Captain Crook and Scuz see from their pirate ship. The Pokéballs that contain the Tentacruel are shot out of a cannon to release them near their targets. Ash Ketchum and Misty manage to capture Captain Crook and his crew and Officer Jenny arrested them. The Tentacruel belonging to Captain Crook were released into the wild.

character.name: Django
character.description: Pocho was hired by a town in the Orange Islands to remove the Electrode which were over-crowding the town. He used he Dugtrio and his numerous Diglett to make tunnels which the electrode went through to get to a peaceful nearby field.

character.name: Digda (Django)
character.description: Pocho was hired by a town in the Orange Islands to remove the Electrode which were over-crowding the town. He used he Dugtrio and his numerous Diglett to make tunnels which the electrode went through to get to a peaceful nearby field.

character.name: Dugtrio (Django)
character.description: Pocho was hired by a town in the Orange Islands to remove the Electrode which were over-crowding the town. He used he Dugtrio and his numerous Diglett to make tunnels which the electrode went through to get to a peaceful nearby field.

character.name: Nidoqueen (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Nidoqueen is a Pokémon owned by Gary Oak and was important in retreiving the GS ball from Jessie, James and Meowth when they had stolen it.

character.name: Gantetsu
character.description: Kurt is a Poké Ball master who lives in Azalea Town.

character.name: Eievui (Ookido Shigeru)
character.description: Just before Gary left towards the Johto region he had a battle with Ash Ketchum using one Pokémon each. Gary used his Eevee and easily defeated Ash`s Pikachu proving how strong Eevee is and how much Gary had improved as a trainer since the Indigo League.

character.name: Utsugi-hakase
character.description: Professor Elm is a former student of Professor Oak and currently lives in New Bark Town where he does his Pokémon Reasearch. Professor Elm is also responsible for giving out either a Chikorita, Totodile or a Cyndaquil to new Pokémon Trainers.

character.name: Nanako
character.description: Casey is a Pokémon Trainer and a big fan of the Electabuzz Baseball Team. Casey`s Father and Grandfather cheered the anthem to the Electabuzz baseball team as they saw Casey off as she started her Pokémon trainer adventure. Casey started her Pokémon journey in New Bark Town where she choose Chikorita as her starting Pokémon. Chikorita shares Casey`s love for Baseball and wears a headband with the Electabuzz baseball team logo on.

character.name: Chicorita (Nanako)
character.description: Casey started her Pokémon journey in New Bark Town where she choose Chikorita as her starting Pokémon. Chikorita shares Casey`s love for Baseball and wears a headband with the Electabuzz baseball team logo on.

character.name: Poppo (Nanako)
character.description: Pidgey is the first Pokémon Casey had caught since her Pokémon journey started in New Bark Town.

character.name: Koratta (Nanako)
character.description: Rattata is the second Pokémon Casey had caught since her Pokémon journey started in New Bark Town. She caught the Rattata using her Chikorita

character.name: Nanako no Chichioya
character.description: Casey`s Father and Grandfather cheered the anthem to the Electabuzz baseball team as they saw Casey off as she started her Pokémon trainer adventure.

character.name: Nanako no Sofu
character.description: Casey`s Father and Grandfather cheered the anthem to the Electabuzz baseball team as they saw Casey off as she started her Pokémon trainer adventure.

character.name: Eleboos Senshu
character.description: The Electabuzz baseball team plays in a league against baseball team`s with Starmie and Magikarp as their mascots amonst others. The Electabuzz baseball team is not the most successful team but theynever give up and they have a loyal fanbase. Casey, her father and grandfather are big fans of the Electabuzz baseball team.

character.name: Morio
character.description: Woodrow completes ordinance surveys on a forest outside of New Bark Town where many Pinsir, Heracross and Butterfree live. Jessie, James and Meowth disturbed the Pinsir`s territory by stealing all of their sap from the trees. The Pinsir vacated their own territory and took over the more passive Heracross`s territory easily as they are the more agreesive Pokémon. With the help of Ash, Misty and Brock they drove Team Rocket out of the forest and the Pinsir quickly returned to their original home and the Heracross reclaimed their own territory. After waving goodbye to Ash and friends, Woodrow remained in the forest to continue his surveys

character.name: Hiiragi
character.description: Rochelle owns a number of Donpan and she trains then to sniff out amberite so she can sell it so that it can eventually be turned into jewelery. Amongst Rochelle`s Donphan there is a young Donphan which can be identified with it short tusks. The young Donphan was currently being trained by Rochelle to sniff out sources of amberite efficiently. After Team Rocket steal her Donphan Rochelle manages to track them down with the help of her other Donphan and Ash. Once the Donphan was recovered Rochelle has Pokemon battle with Ash Ketchum where she defeats Ash`s Heracross using one of her Donphan

character.name: Wakai Donfan (Hiiragi)
character.description: Rochelle owns a number of Donpan and she trains then to sniff out amberite so she can sell it so that it can eventually be turned into jewelery. Amongst Rochelle`s Donphan there is a young Donphan which can be identified with it short tusks. The young Donphan was currently being trained by Rochelle to sniff out sources of amberite efficiently. Team Rocket steal the young Donphan in hope that it could help track down some Amberite so that they could make money from it. However, Team Rocket`s plan backfired quickly backfired due to the young Donphan`s inexperience in locating the amberite. In an attempt to help the Donphan locate some amberite for them Team Rocket made the young Donphan happy by giving it some food. The young Donphan was eventually found and recovered by Rochelle, her Donphan and Ash.

character.name: Donfan (Hiiragi)
character.description: Rochelle owns a number of Donpan and she trains then to sniff out amberite so she can sell it so that it can eventually be turned into jewellery. Team Rocket steals Rochelle`s young Donphan in hope that it could help track down some amberite so that they could make money from it. Rochelle`s Donphan aided her in locating and rescuing the young Donphan along with Ash Ketchum. Once the Donphan was recovered Rochelle has Pokemon battle with Ash Ketchum where she defeats Ash`s Heracross using one of her Donphan.

character.name: Suzu-sama
character.description: Hagatha runs a Hoothoot renting service in a forest that is haunted by ghost Pokémon along with her sister Nagatha. Hagatha and Nagatha are identical but they wear different coloured headbands. Hagatha will rent the Hoothoot and her sister, Nagatha, will collect them once the customer has passed through the forest by using Foresight. One of the Hoothoot owned by Hagatha is inexperienced and has never successfully guided a person through the haunted forest. In addition, this Hoothoot feels most confortable around pretty girls.

character.name: Hoho (Suzu-sama)
character.description: Hagatha runs a Hoothoot renting service in a forest that is haunted by ghost Pokémon along with her sister Nagatha. Hagatha and Nagatha are identical but they wear different coloured headbands. Hagatha will rent the Hoothoot and her sister, Nagatha, will collect them once the customer has passed through the forest by using Foresight. One of the Hoothoot owned by Hagatha is inexperienced and has never successfully guided a person through the haunted forest. In addition, this Hoothoot feels most confortable around pretty girls.

character.name: Kane-sama
character.description: Hagatha runs a Hoothoot renting service in a forest that is haunted by ghost Pokémon along with her sister Nagatha. Hagatha and Nagatha are identical but they wear different coloured headbands. Hagatha will rent the Hoothoot and her sister, Nagatha, will collect them once the customer has passed through the forest by using Foresight. One of the Hoothoot owned by Hagatha is inexperienced and has never successfully guided a person through the haunted forest. In addition, this Hoothoot feels most confortable around pretty girls. Hagatha and Nagatha are identical but they wear different coloured headbands.

character.name: Hikaru
character.description: Bailey trains two Bellossom call Bella and Belle, to perform a number of dance and acrobatic moves for the audience. Before the Pokémon Exibition in Florando, Bailey was trying to get her two Bellossom to perfect a backflip move she called the "Bell-Loop-de-Loop". To complete the "Bell-Loop-de-Loop" Belle would launch Bella into the air who then completed a number of spins before landing on its feet.

character.name: Kireihana (Hikaru)
character.description: Bailey trains two Bellossom call Bella and Belle, to perform a number of dance and acrobatic moves for the audience. Before the Pokémon Exibition in Florando, Bailey was trying to get her two Bellossom to perfect a backflip move she called the "Bell-Loop-de-Loop". To complete the "Bell-Loop-de-Loop" Belle would launch Bella into the air who then completed a number of spins before landing on its feet.

character.name: Kireihana (Hikaru)
character.description: Bailey trains two Bellossom call Bella and Belle, to perform a number of dance and acrobatic moves for the audience. Before the Pokémon Exibition in Florando, Bailey was trying to get her two Bellossom to perfect a backflip move she called the "Bell-Loop-de-Loop". To complete the "Bell-Loop-de-Loop" Belle would launch Bella into the air who then completed a number of spins before landing on its feet.

character.name: Street Performance
character.description: These street performers were practicing for the Pokémon Exibition in Florando whilst giving the onlookers a good show.

character.name: Itomaru (Junsaa)
character.description: Spinarak are used by Officer Jenny and the Police Force in Cattailia City in honour of the Officer Jenny who caught the legendary theif the Black Arachnid many years ago. The Spinarak are useful for creating traps and tripwires which catch the criminal unawares.

character.name: Dai 8 Dai Junsaa
character.description: An ancestor of the Officer Jenny that lived in Cattailia City and is famous for catching the legendary thief called the Black Arachnid using her Spinarak. The Cattailia City Police Force honour this Officer Jenny by continuing to use Spinarak in police work in the present day.

character.name: Itomaru (Dai 8 Dai Junsaa)
character.description: An ancestor of the Officer Jenny that lived in Cattailia City and is famous for catching the legendary theif called the Black Arachnid using her Spinarak. The Cattailia City Police Force honour this Officer Jenny by continuing to use Spinarak in police work in the present day.

character.name: Kaitou Nekohachi
character.description: The legendary theif called The Black Arachnid caused hovoc in Cattailia City by managing to steal manage valueable treasures and eluding the police by having in partner in crime, a Meowth, use Pay Day to confuse the Police Force. The Black Arachnid continued to operate until an ancestor of Officer Jenny captured the Black Arachnid using a Spinarak.

character.name: Nyarth (Kaitou Nekohachi)
character.description: The legendary thief called The Black Arachnid caused havoc in Cattailia City by stealing valuable treasures and eluding the police by having partner in crime, a Meowth, use Pay Day to confuse the Police Force. The Black Arachnid continued to operate until an ancestor of Officer Jenny captured the Black Arachnid using a Spinarak.

character.name: Argy
character.description: The Mayor of Cattailia City keeps many valueable treasures around his house and had to call the police when he received a letter from the Black Arachnid threatening to steal his most prized vase. With the help of Officer Jenny and her Spinarak all of the Mayor`s posessions were safe.

character.name: Kaneyo
character.description: Madame Muchmoney is a very rich lady who owns a big mansion in Palm Hills. She is looked after in the mansion by many members of staff including butlers and a chef. Madame Muchmoney also owns a Snubull who she spoils and pampers a great deal.

character.name: Bulu (Kaneyo)
character.description: Snubull is a well looked after Pokémon who belongs to a wealthly lady called Madame Muchmoney. Madame Muchmoney spoils and pampers Snubull a great deal. However, the Snubull wanted more freedom and frequently ran away from home only to be caught by Muchmoney`s butlers. After seeing how much Snubull enjoyed itself when it battled Meowth, Jessie, James and their Pokémon, Madame Muchmoney money tried to please Snubull by building an outdoor park. Snubull had fond memories of biting onto Meowth`s tale and left the park to pursue it.

character.name: Meshitsukai (Kaneyo)
character.description: Jeeves is the head butler who looks after Madame Muchmoney and her Snubull in her mansion in Palm Hills.

character.name: Cook (Kaneyo)
character.description: Madame Muchmoney`s Cook makes a lot of delicious food for Madame Muchmoney. However, he seems unable to satisfy her Snubull`s taste despite making many exotic dishes. Brock is able to make something Snubull enjoys eating by giving it a simple rice ball.

character.name: Security (Kaneyo)
character.description: Madame Muchmoney`s Security team look after the safety of her property and are even provided with their own house. They are also given the task of returning Snubull when it runs away from home.

character.name: Gardie (Security (Kaneyo))
character.description: The security team that look after Madame Muchmoney also have a Growlithe to help them look after Madame Muchmoney`s property and help them track down her Snubull when it runs away from home. However, Snubull gives Growlithe problems when it bites onto its tail.

character.name: Fujin
character.description: Lady is a wealthy friend of Madame Muchmoney and they planned on getting Madame Muchmoney`s Snubull engaged with Lady`s Snubull called Winthrop.

character.name: Bulu (Fujin)
character.description: Lady is a wealthy friend of Madame Muchmoney and they planned on getting Madame Muchmoney`s Snubull engaged with Lady`s Snubull called Winthrop.

character.name: Saburou
character.description: Salvadore is one of Brock`s younger brothers.

character.name: Yomoko
character.description: Yolanda is one of Brock`s younger sisters.

character.name: Gorou
character.description: Tommy is one of Brock`s younger brothers.

character.name: Mutsuko
character.description: Cindy is one of Brock`s younger sisters.

character.name: Nanako
character.description: Suzie is one of Brock`s younger sisters.

character.name: Yaoki
character.description: Timmy is one of Brock`s younger brothers.

character.name: Kurou
character.description: Billy is one of Brock`s younger brothers.

character.name: Tooko
character.description: Tilly is one of Brock`s younger sisters.

character.name: Makoto
character.description: Arielle resides in the Johto region and was in possession of a whistle which she used to command her Ledyba to polenate an apple nearby apple orchard.

character.name: Rediba (Makoto)
character.description: Arielle used a whistle to command her Ledyba to polenate an apple nearby apple orchard.

character.name: Happinas (Joy)
character.description: Chansey enrolled at a school that was designed specifically for Chansey. It struggled at first but managed to befriend a Jessie who was taking the same course despite being a human. Jessie helped Chansey in its study and started to do well on the course unlike Jessie who could not stay awake during the Chansey`s Sing ability, which was used to lull restless Pokémon to sleep. Just before Jessie left the college, the Chansey that she made friends with, which had just graduated managed to catch up with Jessie and tried to persuade her to finish the course. Jessie explained that she would not be able to finish the course and so Chansey snapped its graduation medal in half and get one half to Jessie as a token of their friendship. During the next few years Chansey evolved into a Blissey and manage to land a nursing position in a Pokémon Centre in Happy Town in the Johto region despite remaining slightly clumsey and over-eager to help at times. Some time later it was reunited with Jessie when they met in a Pokémon Centre in Johto. Blissey tried helping Jessie by giving her the food that was stored in the Pokémon Centre. Blissey was caught on the Pokémon security cameras taking food from the Pokémon Centre`s storeroom and faced losing its position as a nurse. Jessie did not want Blissey to lose its dream job which it worked hard for so James, Meowth and herself claimed they tricked Blissey into giving the food away and even attacked Blissey to make it look convincing. Ash Ketchum made Jessie, James and Meowth blast off but not before Jessie ensured the events at the Pokémon centre will be kept a secret. Blissey and Jessie kept their pieces of the graduation medal and remained friends. [hr] Alolan Region Pokémon Centers Nurse Joy`s Blissey are also great companions to the Joy`s in the Alola region. They sense sadness with its fluffy coat of fur. If it does so, this Pokémon will rush over to a sad person, no matter how far away, to share a Lucky Egg that brings a smile to any face.

character.name: Pikachu (Joy)
character.description: These Pikachus were seen at Viridian City`s Pokemon Center. They provided backup electricity for the Pokemon Center after Team Rocket cut off the main power. They also attacked Team Rocket along with Ash`s Pikachu, to defend the Pokemon Center.

character.name: Shokuan no Shokuin

character.name: Kango Kyoukan
character.description: A professor who teaches Chansey in the skills it takes to be a Pokémon Nurse and maybe go on to work in a Pokémon Centre. She holds classes in bandaging and improving Chansey`s Sing ability which is used to lull restless Pokémon patients to sleep. Although primarily a teacher of Pokémon nursing she found that one year she had a human in one of her classes called Jessie. Jessie was good at the bandaging class but could not stay awake when the Chansey were using their Sing ability. Jessie eventually dropped out of the Nursing School when she realised that she was not suited to the class.

character.name: Lang
character.description: Simon is striving to become a Pokémon Interpreter as he has had various experiences in his life where he has been able to effectively communicate with Pokémon. Ash and his friends encountered him as he suggested to them that they should come to his rest stop so they could recharge Pikachu after he quickly talked with Pikachu to find out what was wrong with it. Simon generally charges trainers a Pokémon Interpreting fee so he can use the money to maintain the rest stop. Officer Jenny mistakenly tried to put Simon under arrest for conducting a Pokémon scam as there had been a lot of complaints recently in the area that someone has been swindling money from trainers while claiming to be a Pokémon Interpreter. Officer Jenny though that Simon fit the description perfectly but later after he ended up saving the Pokémon Center, she was informed by Nurse Joy that he was able to communicate enough with the Magnemite and Magneton to get them to stop draining the power. Officer Jenny`s opinion of Simon changed drastically enough for her to believe that he truly was a Pokémon Interpreter. 60 years earlier, Simon was caught in a thunderstorm and a tornado was approaching him as he watched in the field. His dad quickly picked him up and threw him in a storm celler and told him not to come out as he was going to check on the neighbors. Scared and wishing for his dad, Simon heard Pokémon voices and he could understand them. Simon was surprised that he could talk to them and he forgot about the storm until people came to get him. His farm was destroyed and he never saw the three Pokémon he talked to ever again. Just before Simon said his farewell`s to Ash and his friends, they told him to keep working at becoming a Pokémon Interpreter as he just needed a small breakthrough. As Simon was walking, he encountered Team Rocket Meowth who old Simon to not give up as well.

character.name: Mikan
character.description: Jasmine is the Gym Leader of the Olivine Gym and she also runs the Glitter Lighthouse in Olivine City where her Ampharos is stationed. She first met Ash and his friends at the lighthouse when her Ampharos was sick. Ash went and got some medicine for it. At a later time, Ash challenged Jasmine for a gym badge. Ash`s Pikachu and Cyndaquil battled against her and proved to be a sufficient combo in order to defeat her and obtain the Mineral Badge. Jasmine met up with Ash and Brock in Sunyshore City in the Sinnoh region. She met Dawn and the Sinnoh Elite Four member Flint. She challenged him to a battle with her Steelix but Flint used his Infernape which had a significant type advantage as well as being his most powerful Pokémon. Jasmine was easily defeated by Flint.

While at Sunyshore City in the Sinnoh region, Jasmine met the Sinnoh Elite Four member Flint. She challenged him to a battle with her Steelix but Flint used his Infernape which had a significant type advantage as well as being his most powerful Pokémon. Jasmine`s Steelix was easily defeated by Flint`s Infernape.

character.name: Dick
character.description: Dick is a Power Plant worker in Gunjo City (グンジョシティ). His name is based off the author Philip K. Dick who wrote the book "Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?", which is a pun of the episode title Do Coil Dream of Electric Mice!? (コイルはでんきネズミのユメをみるか!?) which Dick appears in. His name was confirmed in the Japanese closed captions for that episode. With his co-worker Philip, they went to investigate the cause of the power outage which ended up being a large group of Grimer`s who were clogging up the tunnels where the water for the generators flowed. With Ash and Pikachu`s help, Philip and Dick were able to get the power plant up and running once again.

character.name: Philip
character.description: Philip is a Power Plant worker in Gunjo City (グンジョシティ). His name is based off the author Philip K. Dick who wrote the book "Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?", which is a pun of the episode title Do Coil Dream of Electric Mice!? (コイルはでんきネズミのユメをみるか!?) which Philip appears in. His name was confirmed in the Japanese closed captions for that episode. With his co-worker Dick, they went to investigate the cause of the power outage which ended up being a large group of Grimer`s who were clogging up the tunnels where the water for the generators flowed. With Ash and Pikachu`s help, Philip and Dick were able to get the power plant up and running once again.

character.name: Yadoking
character.description: Slowking lives in the Orange Islands and it is very familiar with the ancient legend regarding the Legendary birds, Moltres, Zapdos and Articuno which states: "Disturb not the harmony of fire, ice or lightning..." During the snow storm, it said it wish it had pants. When Ash arrived, he was surprised that it could talk when it told him to put the treasures on the stone mantle. Ash was also surprised that it knew his name as it had studied the legend and had realized that the "earth shall turn to ash" part referred to him.

character.name: Takeshi
character.description: Darren was the victor in a pre-tournament battle at the Johto Silver Conference. He is from Cianwood and he has a Donfan.

character.name: Sonchou
character.description: The mayor of the village where there isn`t any crops growing or much food left because their fields were drying up due to the lack of water. The mayor of the town invites Ash and his friends for a meal to explain the situation to them and tells them that the river had dried up. Ash and his friends go out to investigate the situation for the mayor of the town.

character.name: Isao to Masami no Sofu
character.description: Mateo & Marissa`s Grandfather ran a glass and crystal shop on Sunburst Island until he died. When he ran the store, it was full of glass and it was a big success. He was a really talented artist and he made beautiful glass Pokémon sculptures every day. He told Mateo all the time that when he was a young artist he saw the Crystal Onix and that`s what inspired him to make great sculptures. After seeing the Crystal Onix, he turned out one great sculpture after another. Whenever he needed some inspiration, all he had to do was think of that Crystal Onix. Mateo & Marissa took over his shop after he died and continued in his footsteps.

character.name: Pokemon Zukan
character.description: The first generation of the Kanto Pokedex.

character.name: Pokemon Zukan
character.description: The first generation of the Jouto Pokedex and the Pokedex of the second generation.

character.name: Lang no Chichioya
character.description: Simon was caught in a thunderstorm and a tornado was approaching him as he watched in the field. Simon`s dad quickly picked him up and threw him in a storm celler and told him not to come out as he was going to check on the neighbors. Scared and wishing for his dad, Simon heard Pokémon voices and he could understand them. When the storm was over, people came to get him but the farm was destroyed. It is unknown if Simon`s Father died in the storm or not.

character.name: Mitsuji
character.description: Fernando was first seen battling in the stadium at the Kentauros Battles at the trade meet festival in a town near Kogane City. When Ash and his friends came to watch the battle, they saw Fernando win his fifth consecutive victory with his Tauros. Ash was excited to battle after watching Fernando and he got Professor Samual Oak to transfer his Tauros over so he could battle. When Ash returned to the stadium, Fernando had just won his 10th consecutive win and the announcer was just about to declare him the victor as there was no more challengers. Ash challenged Fernando to a battle but having won 10 battles already Fernando was quite confident. The battle didn`t last too long and it looked like Fernando`s Tauros was going to win but in a last effort, Ash`s Tauros used Take Down which flipped over Fernando`s Tauros and gave Ash the win.

character.name: Kentauros (Mitsuji)
character.description: Fernando`s Tauros was entered into the Kentauros Battles at the trade meet festival at a town near Kogane City by his trainer Fernando. It won its 10th consecutive win in the tournament and the announcer was just about to declare it the victor as there was no more challengers when Ash challenged Fernando to a battle. The battle didn`t last too long and it looked like Fernando`s Tauros was going to win but in a last effort, Ash`s Tauros used Take Down which flipped over Fernando`s Tauros and gave Ash the win.

character.name: Norman
character.description: Norman is an attendant at a bridge that goes to Sunny Town but the bridge is only for cars and bicycles. He informed Ash and his friends that the bridge is over 10 miles long but a section was still under construction. He then explained to them that the bicycle path was completed so they could get across that way but it would be dark before they reached the other side.

character.name: Konta
character.description: Konta is a young boy that lives in Dark City in the Kanto Region. He initially was angry at Pokémon Trainers and would throw rocks at them because they would join the local gyms as bodyguards and cause havoc in the city. After getting to know Ash and see how real Trainers are supposed to act, his attitude changed and he was able to see Pokémon Trainers in a new light. He asked for Pikachu`s autograph and he then planned to aim to become a Pokémon Trainer. Konta`s name was revealed only in the Japanese closed captions.

character.name: Kanta

He asked for Pikachu`s autograph and he then planned to aim to become a Pokémon Trainer. Kanta`s name was revealed only in the Japanese closed captions.

Slowking`s Day
Yadoking no Ichinichi
episode.summary: The short describes a day in the life of Slowking. It starts when Slowking wakes up at dawn in his cave overlooking the three small islands close to Shamouti Island. Slowking goes down to the beach and uses his psychic abilities to grab a coconut for breakfast, opening it by banging it on the shell on his head. He then takes a walk around the shrine where the climactic scene of The Power of One took place, and stops to smell the flowers that surround it on the cliff. Yawning, Slowking then crawls onto a rock in the middle of the flower field and takes an afternoon nap. After a while, a Butterfree passes by as Slowking wakes up. Commenting on how good the weather is, Slowking walks to the edge of the cliff, stretches, and jumps into the ocean to swim. In the water, he meets and greets his good friend, a Seel. Eventually Slowking leaves the ocean with a lot of seafood, and eats it while sitting on the cliff and watching the sunset. As many stars shine in the sky, Slowking returns to his cave and falls asleep.
